column3: Warren plans to take a 'hard look' at running for president
column4: Warren planira ozbiljno razmisliti o kandidaturi za predsjednicu

column3: U.S. Sen. Elizabeth Warren says she'll take a "hard look at running for president" after the November elections.
column4: Američka senatorica Elizabeth Warren rekla je da će "ozbiljno razmisliti o kandidaturi za predsjednicu" nakon izbora u studenom.

column3: The Boston Globe reports the Massachusetts Democrat spoke about her future during a town hall in western Massachusetts Saturday.
column4: Časopis "The Boston Globe" navodi da je Warren, demokratkinja iz Massachusettsa, govorila o svojoj političkoj budućnosti na sastanku s glasačima u zapadnom Massachusettsu u subotu.

column3: Warren, a frequent critic of President Donald Trump, is running for re-election in November against GOP state Rep. Geoff Diehl, who was co-chairman of Trump's 2016 Massachusetts campaign.
column4: Warren, žestoka kritičarka predsjednika Donalda Trumpa, borit će se za ponovni mandat u Senatu na izborima u studenom protiv kandidata Republikanske stranke u Massachusettsu Geoffa Diehla, koji je bio zamjenik voditelja Trumpove kampanje u toj državi 2016.

column3: She has been at the center of speculation that she might take on Trump in 2020.
column4: Mnogi su nagađali da bi se upravo ona mogla suprotstaviti Trumpu na izborima 2020.

column3: Saturday afternoon's event in Holyoke was her 36th meeting with constituents using the town hall format since Trump took office.
column4: Sastanak u Holyokeu koji je održan u subotu popodne bio je njen 36. sastanak s glasačima u formatu gradske skupštine otkako je Trump postao predsjednik.

column3: An attendee asked her if she planned to run for president.
column4: Jedan od sudionika pitao ju je planira li se kandidirati za predsjednicu.

column3: Warren replied that it's time "for women to go to Washington to fix our broken government, and that includes a woman at the top."
column4: Warren je odgovorila da je vrijeme "da žene odu u Washington i poprave našu slomljenu vladu, a to podrazumijeva i ženu na samom vrhu."

column3: Mexico's AMLO vows not to use military against civilians
column4: Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador obećao da neće slati vojsku na civile

column3: Mexican President-elect Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador has vowed to never use military force against civilians as the country approaches the 50th anniversary of a bloody reprisal against students.
column4: Izabrani meksički predsjednik Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador obećao da nikad neće upotrijebiti vojnu silu na civilima, dok se država približava 50. godišnjici krvavog obračuna sa studentima.

column3: Lopez Obrador promised Saturday at Tlatelolco Plaza to "never ever use the military to repress the Mexican people."
column4: Lopez Obrador je u subotu na trgu Tlatelolco Plaza obećao da "nikad neće upotrijebiti vojsku za represiju meksičkog naroda".

column3: Troops fired on a peaceful demonstration at the plaza on Oct. 2, 1968, killing as many as 300 people at a time when leftist student movements were taking root throughout Latin America.
column4: Na mirnom prosvjedu na trgu koji se održao 2. listopada 1968. godine, vojska je pucala na prosvjednike i usmrtila čak 300 ljudi, i to u vrijeme kad su se ljevičarski studentski pokreti počeli širiti po Latinskoj Americi.

column3: Lopez Obrador has pledged to support young Mexicans by giving monthly subsidies to those who study and opening more free public universities.
column4: Lopez Obrador obećao je i da će pomoći mladim Meksikancima putem mjesečnih stipendija studentima te otvaranjem novih javnih sveučilišta.

column3: He has said that unemployment and a lack of educational opportunities draws youth to criminal gangs.
column4: Rekao je da nezaposlenost i nedostatak obrazovnih mogućnosti usmjerava mlade prema kriminalnim bandama.

column3: Volcano spews ash on Mexico City
column4: Vulkanski pepeo pada na Me ksiko City

column3: Ash spewing from the Popocatepetl volcano has reached the southern neighborhoods of Mexico's capital.
column4: Pepeo iz vulkana Popokatepetla došao je do južnih četvrti glavnog grada Meksika.

column3: The National Center for Disaster Prevention warned Mexicans on Saturday to stay away from the volcano after activity picked up in the crater and it registered 183 emissions of gas and ash over 24 hours.
column4: Nacionalni centar za sprječavanje katastrofa u subotu je upozorio Meksikance da se drže podalje od vulkana nakon što je u krateru zabilježena aktivnost tijekom koje su u 24 sata zabilježene 183 emisije plinova i pepela.

column3: The center was monitoring multiple rumblings and tremors.
column4: Centar je pratio tutnjavu i brojna podrhtavanja.

column3: Images on social media showed thin layers of ash coating car windshields in neighborhoods of Mexico City such as Xochimilco.
column4: Fotografije sa društvenih mreža pokazivale su kako tanki slojevi pepela pokrivaju vjetrobrane automobila u nekim četvrtima Me ksiko Cityja, poput četvrti Xochimilc o .

column3: Geophysicists have noticed an increase in activity at the volcano that sits 45 miles (72 kilometers) southeast of the capital since a 7.1-magnitude earthquake rocked central Mexico in September 2017.
column4: Geofizičari primje ćuju povećanje aktivnosti vulkana, koji se nalazi 45 milja (72 kilometra) jugoistočno od glavnog grada, još od rujna 2017., kada je središnje dijelove Meksika pogodio potres magnitude 7.1 po Richteru.

column3: The volcano known as "Don Goyo" has been active since 1994.
column4: Vulkan, koji je poznat pod nazivom „Don Goyo “, aktivan je od 1994.

column3: Analyst lays out timeline of night woman was burned alive
column4: Analitičar izložio kronološki slijed događaja u noći u kojoj je žena živa spaljena

column3: The prosecution rested its case Saturday in the retrial of a man who is accused of burning a Mississippi woman alive in 2014.
column4: Tužiteljstvo je u subotu iznijelo završne riječi u ponovnom suđenju muškarcu koji je optužen da je 2014. u Mississippiju ženu živu spalio.

column3: U.S. Department of Justice Analyst Paul Rowlett testified for hours as an expert witness in the field of intelligence analysis.
column4: Svjedočenje analitičara američkog Ministarstva pravosuđa Paula Rowletta u kojem je svjedočio kao stručnjak u području obavještajne djelatnosti trajalo je satima.

column3: He outlined for the jury how he used cellphone records to piece together the movements of 29-year-old defendant Quinton Tellis and the 19-year-old victim, Jessica Chambers, on the night she died.
column4: Poroti je objasnio kako je pomoću ispisa poziva uspio sastaviti tijek kretanja 29-godišnjeg optuženika Quintona Tellisa i 19-godišnje žrtve, Jessice Chambers, u noći kada je umrla.

column3: Rowlett said he received location data from several cellphones that showed Tellis was with Chambers the evening of her death, contradicting his previous claims, The Clarion Ledger reported .
column4: Rowlett je rekao da je primio podatke o lokaciji od nekoliko mobilnih telefona koji su pokazali da je Tellis bio sa Chambers u noći kada je umrla, što je kontradiktorno njegovim prijašnjim tvrdnjama, prenosi The Clarion Ledger.

column3: When data showed his cellphone was with Chambers' during the time he said he was with his friend Michael Sanford, police went to talk to Sanford.
column4: Kada su podaci pokazali da je njegov mobitel bio uz Chambersin u vrijeme kada je rekao da je bio sa svojim prijateljem Michaelom Sanfordom, policija je otišla razgovarati sa Sanfordom.

column3: Sanford took the stand Saturday and testified that he wasn't in town that day.
column4: Sanford je na sudu svjedočio u subotu i rekao da taj dan nije bio u gradu.

column3: When prosecutors asked if Tellis was telling the truth when he said he was in Sanford's truck that night, Sanford said he was "lying, because my truck was in Nashville."
column4: Kada je tužiteljstvo pitalo Tellisa je li govorio istinu kada je rekao da je te noći bio sa Sanfordom, odgovorio je da je "lagao, jer mu je kamion bio u Nashvilleu".

column3: Another inconsistency was that Tellis said he had known Chambers for about two weeks when she died.
column4: Još jedna nedosljednost je ta što Tellis tvrdi da je znao Chambers oko dva tjedna kada je umrla.

column3: Cellphone records indicated they'd only known each other for a week.
column4: Ispisi poziva pokazuju da su se znali tek tjedan dana.

column3: Rowlett said that sometime after Chambers' death, Tellis deleted Chambers' texts, calls and contact information from his phone.
column4: Rowlett tvrdi da je u jednom trenutku nakon Chambersine smrti Tellis sa svojeg mobitela izbrisao njene poruke, pozive i broj.

column3: He erased her from his life, Hale said.
column4: Izbrisao ju je iz svog života, rekao je Hale.

column3: The defense is scheduled to begin its closing arguments Sunday.
column4: Obrana sa svojim završnim riječima treba započeti u nedjelju.

column3: The judge said he expected the trial to go to the jury later that day.
column4: Sudac je rekao da očekuje da će slučaj biti predan poroti kasnije istog dana.

column3: Kanye West: Rapper changes his name to Ye
column4: Kanye West: reper mijenja ime u Ye

column3: Rapper Kanye West is changing his name - to Ye.
column4: Reper Kanye West mijenja svoje ime- u Ye.

column3: Announcing the change on Twitter on Saturday, he wrote: "The being formally known as Kanye West."
column4: Najavljujući tu promjenu na Twitteru u subotu, napisao je: "Biće prethodno poznato kao Kanye West."

column3: West, 41, has been nicknamed Ye for some time and used the moniker as the title for his eighth album, which was released in June.
column4: West, koji ima 41 godinu, već neko vrijeme nosi nadimak Ye te je koristio taj naziv za svoj osmi album, koji je objavljen u lipnju.

column3: The change comes ahead of his appearance on Saturday Night Live, where he is expected to launch his new album Yandhi.
column4: Promjena će izaći na vidjelo u emisiji "Saturday Night Live", gdje se ujedno i očekuje da će izbaciti svoj novi album "Yandhi".

column3: He replaces singer Ariana Grande on the show who cancelled for "emotional reasons," the show's creator said.
column4: U emisiji će zamijeniti pjevačicu Arianu Grande, koja je otkazala svoj dolazak zbog "emocionalnih razloga", rekao je tvorac emisije.

column3: As well as being an abbreviation of his current professional name, West has previously said the word has religious significance for him.
column4: Osim što se radi o skraćenici za njegovo trenutno službeno ime, West je prethodno rekao kako je ta riječ od religioznog značaja za njega.

column3: I believe 'ye' is the most commonly used word in the Bible, and in the Bible it means 'you,' West said earlier this year, discussing his album title with radio host Big Boy.
column4: Smatram kako je riječ Ye najviše korištena riječ u Bibliji, te ondje ima značenje You" (ti)", izjavio je West ranije ove godine, govoreći o svom nazivu albuma s radijskim voditeljem Big Boy-em.

column3: So I'm you, I'm us, it's us.	Dakle, ja sam ti, ja sam mi, to smo mi.
It went from Kanye, which means the only one, to just Ye - just being a reflection of our good, our bad, our confused, everything.
column4: Preimenovao sam se iz "Kanye", što znači "jedini", u "Ye", što je odraz našeg dobrog, lošeg, zbunjujućeg, svega.

column3: The album is more of a reflection of who we are."
column4: Album je više odraz onoga što smo mi."

column3: He is one of a number of famous rappers to change their name.
column4: West je jedan od brojnih poznatih repera koji su promijenili svoje ime.

column3: Sean Combs has been variously known as Puff Daddy, P. Diddy or Diddy, but this year announced his preference for the names Love and Brother Love.
column4: Sean Combs bio je poznat kao "Puff Daddy", "P. Diddy" te "Diddy", no ove je godine objavio kako preferira nazive "Love" i "Brother Love" (hrv. "Ljubav" i "Bratska ljubav").

column3: A former West collaborator, JAY-Z, has also made do with or without a hyphen and capitals.
column4: Ime bivšeg Westova suradnika, JAY-Z-ja, pojavljuje se sa spojnicom ili bez nje te velikih ili malih slova.

column3: HIV/Aids: China reports 14% surge in new cases
column4: HIV/AIDS: U Kini 14 % više novih slučajeva

column3: China has announced a 14% jump in the number of its citizens who are living with HIV and Aids.
column4: Kina je izjavila da je broj ljudi koji žive s HIV-om i AIDS-om porastao za 14 %.

column3: More than 820,000 people are affected in the country, health officials say.
column4: Zdravstveni službenici kažu da je zaraženo više od 820.000 ljudi u zemlji.

column3: About 40,000 new cases were reported in the second quarter of 2018 alone.
column4: Samo u drugom kvartalu 2018. godine prijavljeno je otprilike 40.000 novih slučajeva.

column3: The vast majority of new cases were transmitted through sex, marking a change from the past.
column4: Za razliku od prošlih slučajeva, velika većina tih novih slučajeva nastala je zbog zaraze putem seksa.

column3: Traditionally, HIV spread rapidly through some parts of China as a result of infected blood transfusions.
column4: HIV se inače brzo raširio nekim dijelovima Kine zbog inficiranih transfuzija krvi.

column3: But the number of people contracting HIV in this way had been reduced to almost zero, Chinese health officials said at a conference in Yunnan province.
column4: No, kineski su zdravstveni službenici na konferenciji u provinciji Yunnan izjavili da je broj ljudi koji se tako zarazio HIV-om sada blizu nule.

column3: Year-on-year, however, the number of those living with HIV and Aids in China has risen by 100,000 people.
column4: Godina za godinom, i broj ljudi koji žive s HIV-om i AIDS-om se u Kini povećao za 100.000 ljudi.

column3: HIV transmission through sex is an acute issue in China's LGBT community.
column4: Prijenos HIV-a putem seksa je akutni problem LGBT zajednice u Kini.

column3: Homosexuality was decriminalised in China in 1997, but discrimination against LGBT people is said to be rife.
column4: Homoseksualnost je dekriminalizirana u Kini 1997. godine, ali diskriminacija protiv LGBTQ osoba još je uvijek česta.

column3: Because of the country's conservative values, studies have estimated that 70-90% of men who have sex with men will eventually marry women.
column4: Istraživanja su pokazala da će se zbog konzervatizma u državi 70-90 % muškaraca koji spavaju s muškarcima kasnije oženiti za ženu.

column3: Many of the transmissions of the diseases come from inadequate sexual protections in these relationships.
column4: Mnoge zarazne bolesti potiču od neadekvatne seksualne zaštite kod takvih odnosa.

column3: Since 2003, China's government has promised universal access to HIV medication as part of an effort to tackle the issue.
column4: Kineska je vlada 2003. godine izjavila da će pružiti potpuni pristup HIV lijekovima kako bi pomogli u rješavanju problema.

column3: Deptford road crash: Cyclist dies in collision with car
column4: Prometna nesreća u Deptfordu: Biciklist preminuo u sudaru s automobilom

column3: A cyclist has died in a collision involving a car in London.
column4: Biciklist je preminuo u sudaru s automobilom u Londonu.

column3: The crash happened near the junction of Bestwood Street and Evelyn Street, a busy road in Deptford, in the south-east of the city, at about 10:15 BST.
column4: Nesreća se dogodila u blizini raskrižja Bestwood Streeta i Evelyn Streeta u prometnoj ulici u Deptfordu u jugoistočnom dijelu grada oko 10:15 sati po britanskom ljetnom vremenu.

column3: The driver of the car stopped and paramedics attended, but the man died at the scene.
column4: Vozač auta je stao i medicinsko osoblje pružilo je pomoć unesrećenom, ali muškarac je preminuo na mjestu nesreće.

column3: The crash comes months after another cyclist died in a hit-and-run on Childers Street, about a mile away from Saturday's crash.
column4: Nesreća se dogodila nekoliko mjeseci nakon što je drugi biciklist preminuo nakon što ga je u Childers Streetu nepoznati počinitelj udario i pobjegao s mjesta nesreće, oko 1,6 kilometara dalje od nesreće koja se dogodila u nedjelju.

column3: The Metropolitan Police said officers were working to identify the man and inform his next-of-kin.
column4: Iz Gradske policije kažu da njihovi službenici rade na identifikaciji muškarca kako bi obavijestili njegovu najbližu obitelj.

column3: Road closures and bus diversions are in place and motorists have been advised to avoid the area.
column4: Ceste su zatvorene, autobusi preusmjereni, a vozačima se savjetuje da izbjegavaju to područje.

column3: Bernard Vann: WW1 Victoria Cross cleric celebrated
column4: ﻿Bernard Vann: Proslavljen svećenik Victoria Crossa (Viktorijina Križa) iz Prvog svjetskog rata

column3: The only Church of England cleric to win a Victoria Cross during World War One as a combatant has been celebrated in his hometown 100 years on.
column4: Jedini svećenik Engleske crkve koji je u Prvom svjetskom ratu nagrađen Victoria Crossom za svoje akcije kao borac proslavljen je u svom rodnom gradu 100 godina kasnije.

column3: Lt Col The Reverend Bernard Vann won the award on 29 September 1918 in the attack at Bellenglise and Lehaucourt.
column4: Potpukovnik velečasni Bernard Vann nagradu je osvojio 29. rujna 1918. u napadu na Bellenglise i Lehaucourt.

column3: However, he was killed by a sniper four days later and never knew he had won the highest British military honour.
column4: Međutim, četiri dana kasnije ubio ga je snajperist i nikada nije saznao da mu je dodijeljena najviša i najprestižnija nagrada britanskog sustava počasti.

column3: A commemorative stone was unveiled by his two grandsons at a parade in Rushden, Northamptonshire, on Saturday.
column4: Spomen-ploču su otkrila njegova dva unuka na paradi u Rushdenu, Northamptonshire, u subotu.

column3: One of his grandsons, Michael Vann, said it was "brilliantly symbolic" the stone would be revealed exactly 100 years on from his grandfather's award-winning feat.
column4: Jedan od njegovih unuka, Michael Vann, rekao je da je „nevjerojatno simbolično“ da će se kamen otkriti točno 100 godina nakon nagrađivanog junačkog djela njegova djeda.

column3: According to the London Gazette, on 29 September 1918 Lt Col Vann led his battalion across the Canal de Saint-Quentin "through a very thick fog and under heavy fire from field and machine guns."
column4: Prema London Gazetteu, 29. rujna 1918.,  potpukovnik Vann vodio je svoj bataljon preko Canala de Saint-Quentin „kroz vrlo gustu maglu i pod jakom paljbom iz poljskih topova i mitraljeza.“

column3: He later rushed up to the firing line and with the "greatest gallantry" led the line forward before rushing a field-gun single-handed and knocked out three of the detachment.
column4: Kasnije je pojurio do vatrene linije i s „najvećom galantnošću“ poveo liniju naprijed prije nego što je samostalno zauzeo top i onesposobio trojicu iz odreda.

column3: Lt Col Vann was killed by a German sniper on 4 October 1918 - just over a month before the war ended.
column4: Potpukovnika Vanna ubio je njemački snajperist 4. listopada 1918. – nešto više od mjesec dana prije završetka rata.

column3: Michael Vann, 72, said his grandfather's actions were "something that I know that I could never live up to but something which is humbling."
column4: Michael Vann (72) rekao je da su postupci njegova djeda „nešto što nikad ne bi mogao postići, ali nešto što je ponizno“.

column3: He and his brother Dr James Vann also laid a wreath after the parade, which was led by the Brentwood Imperial Youth Band.
column4: On i njegov brat dr. James Vann također su položili vijenac nakon parade koju je vodila grupa Brentwood Imperial Youth Band.

column3: Michael Vann said he was "feeling very honoured to play a part in the parade" and added "the valour of a genuine hero is being demonstrated by the support that is going to be given by a lot of people."
column4: Michael Vann rekao je da se „osjeća vrlo počašćeno što će sudjelovati u paradi“ i dodao da „hrabrost istinskog heroja pokazuje podrška koju će pružiti mnogi ljudi“.

column3: The High Breed: What is conscious hip hop?
column4: The High Breed: Što je osviješteni hip-hop?

column3: A hip hop trio wants to challenge the negative view of the genre by filling their music with positive messages.
column4: Hip-hop trio želi preispitati negativne stavove koji se povezuju s ovim žanrom tako što ispunjuju svoju glazbu pozitivnim porukama.

column3: The High Breed, from Bristol, claim hip hop moved away from its origins of political messages and tackling social issues.
column4: Glazbenici iz bristolske skupine High Breed tvrde da se hip-hop udaljio od svojih početaka u kojima su dominirale političke poruke i hvatanje u koštac s problemima u društvu.

column3: They want to go back to its roots and make conscious hip hop popular again.
column4: Žele se vratiti korijenima hip-hopa i ponovno učiniti osviješteni hip-hop (engl. conscious hip-hop) popularnim.

column3: Artists like The Fugees and Common have seen a recent resurgence in the UK through artists such as Akala and Lowkey.
column4: Glazbenici poput The Fugeesa i Commona ovih su dana doživjeli resurekciju u Ujedinjenom Kraljevstvu u glazbenicima poput Akale i Lowkeyja.

column3: Attempted murder charge over Belfast restaurant stabbing
column4: Optužba za pokušaj ubojstva nožem u restoranu u Belfastu

column3: A 45-year-old man has been charged with attempted murder after a man was stabbed in a restaurant in east Belfast on Friday.
column4: 45-godišnjak je optužen za pokušaj ubojstva muškarca nožem u petak u restoranu u istočnom Belfastu.

column3: The incident happened in Ballyhackamore, police said.
column4: Nemio slučaj dogodio se u naselju Ballyhackamore, javlja policija.

column3: The defendant is expected to appear before Belfast Magistrates' Court on Monday.
column4: Optuženik se u ponedjeljak treba pojaviti pred Prekršajnim sudom u Belfastu (Belfast Magistrates' Court).

column3: The charges will be reviewed by the Public Prosecution Service.
column4: Optužbu će pregledati Državno odvjetništvo.

column3: Elite League: Dundee Stars 5-3 Belfast Giants
column4: ﻿Elitna liga hokeja na ledu: Dundee Stars – Belfast Giants 5:3

column3: Patrick Dwyer hit two goals for the Giants against Dundee
column4: Patrick Dwyer zabio dva gola za Giantse protiv Dundeeja

column3: Dundee Stars atoned for Friday's Elite League loss against Belfast Giants by winning the return match 5-3 in Dundee on Saturday.
column4: Dundee Stars iskupili su se za svoj gubitak utakmice prošlog petka u Elitnoj ligi protiv Belfast Giantsa pobjedom u uzvratnoj utakmici 5:3 u Dundeeju ove subote.

column3: The Giants got an early two-goal lead through strikes from Patrick Dwyer and Francis Beauvillier.
column4: Giantsi su s početka krenuli u vodstvo s dva pogotka Patricka Dwyera i Francisa Beauvilliera.

column3: Mike Sullivan and Jordan Cownie brought the home side level before Dwyer restored the Giants' lead.
column4: Mike Sullivan i Jordan Cownie izjednačili su rezultat za domaćine dok Dwyer nije ponovno poveo Giantse u vodstvo.

column3: Francois Bouchard equalised for Dundee before two Lukas Lundvald Nielsen goals secured their victory.
column4: Francois Bouchard izjednačio je za Dundeeje prije nego su dva gola Lukasa Lundevalda Nielsena osigurala njihovu pobjedu.

column3: It was a third Elite League defeat of the season for Adam Keefe's men, who had come from behind to beat Dundee 2-1 in Belfast on Friday night.
column4: To je bio treći poraz u Elitnoj ligi u sezoni za momčad Adama Keefea, koja je napravila preokret u utakmici protiv Dundeeja i pobijedila 2:1 u Belfastu u petak navečer.

column3: It was a fourth meeting of the season between the sides, with the Giants winning the previous three matches.
column4: To je bio četvrti susret u sezoni između dviju momčadi, a Giantsi su pobijedili prethodne tri utakmice.

column3: Dwyer's opener came in the fourth minute on 3:35 from a Kendall McFaull assist, with David Rutherford providing the assist as Beauvillier doubled the lead four minutes later.
column4: Dwyer je zabio prvi gol u trećoj minuti uz asistenciju Kendalla McFaulla, dok je David Rutherford asistirao Beauvillieru koji je udvostručio vodstvo četiri minute kasnije.

column3: In what was a busy opening period, Sullivan brought the home side back into the game on 13:10 before Matt Marquardt became provider for Cownie's equaliser on 15:16.
column4: U gužvovitom otvaranju utakmice, Sullivan je pogotkom vratio domaćine u igru u 13. minuti, prije nego je Matt Marquardt osigurao Cowniejev gol za izjednačenje u 15. minuti.

column3: Dwyer made sure the Giants took a lead into the first break when he hit his second goal of the night at the end of the first period.
column4: Dwyer je poveo Giantse u vodstvo na prvoj pauzi kad je zabio drugi gol večeri na kraju prve trećine.

column3: The home side regrouped and Bouchard once again put them on level terms with a power play goal on 27:37.
column4: Domaćini su se regrupirali i Bouchard je ponovno izjednačio igrom snage u 27. minuti.

column3: Cownie and Charles Corcoran combined to help Nielsen give Dundee the lead for the first time in the match late in the second period and he made sure of the win with his team's fifth halfway through the final period.
column4: Cownie i Charles Corcoran ujedinjenim su snagama pomogli Nielsenu da povede Dundeeje u vodstvo prvi put u utakmici krajem druge trećine, a Nielsen je osigurao pobjedu svog tima petim zgoditkom u polovici posljednje trećine.

column3: The Giants, who have now lost four of their last five matches, are at home to Milton Keynes in their next match on Friday.
column4: Giantsi, koji su izgubili četiri od svojih pet posljednjih utakmica, na domaćem terenu će ugostiti Milton Keynese na svojoj sljedećoj utakmici u petak.

column3: Long Lartin prison: Six officers hurt in disorder
column4: Britanski zatvor Long Lartin: Šest čuvara ozlijeđeno u neredima

column3: Six prison officers have been injured in a disturbance at a high security men's jail, the Prison Office has said.
column4: Šest zatvorskih čuvara zadobilo je ozljede u nemirima u strogo čuvanom muškom zatvoru, izjavila je Britanska zatvorska služba.

column3: Disorder broke out at HMP Long Lartin in Worcestershire at about 09:30 BST on Sunday and is ongoing.
column4: Neredi su izbili prošle nedjelje u zatvoru Long Lartin u grofoviji Worcestershire oko 09:30 po britanskom vremenu te još uvijek traju.

column3: Specialist "Tornado" officers have been brought in to deal with the disturbance, which involves eight inmates and is contained to one wing.
column4: Specijalna policijska jedinica „Tornado“ poslana je kako bi obuzdala nerede u kojima sudjeluje osmero zatvorenika i koji su ograničeni na jedno zatvorsko krilo.

column3: The officers were treated for minor facial injuries at the scene.
column4: Policajcima su na licu mjesta sanirane manje rane na licu.

column3: A Prison Service spokesperson said: "Specially trained prison staff have been deployed to deal with an ongoing incident at HMP Long Lartin.
column4: Glasnogovornik zatvorske službe rekao je: „Poslali smo specijalno obučeno zatvorsko osoblje kako bi oni obuzdali incident koji trenutno traje u zatvoru Long Lartin.

column3: Six members of staff have been treated for injuries.
column4: Šest zaposlenika primilo je liječničku pomoć zbog ozljeda.

column3: We do not tolerate violence in our prisons, and are clear that those responsible will be referred to the police and could spend longer behind bars."
column4: Ne toleriramo nasilje u našim zatvorima i jasno dajemo do znanja da će odgovorni biti upućeni policiji te da bi im zatvorska kazna mogla biti produžena.

column3: HMP Long Lartin holds more than 500 prisoners, including some of the country's most dangerous offenders.
column4: U zatvoru Long Lartin više je od 500 zatvorenika, među kojima su i neki od najopasnijih zločinaca u Ujedinjenom Kraljevstvu.

column3: In June it was reported that the prison's governor received hospital treatment after being attacked by a prisoner.
column4: Prošlog lipnja objavljena je vijest da je upravitelj zatvora završio u bolnici nakon što ga je napao jedan od zatvorenika.

column3: And in October last year riot officers were called to the prison to deal with a serious disturbance in which staff were attacked with pool balls.
column4: U listopadu prošle godine interventna policija poslana je da obuzda ozbiljne nerede u kojima su zatvorenici lopticama za biljar napali zaposlenike zatvora.

column3: North Korea defector numbers 'drop' under Kim
column4: Smanjenje broja prebjega iz Sjeverne Koreje pod Kimovom vlasti

column3: The number of North Korean defectors to South Korea has fallen since Kim Jong-un came to power seven years ago, a South Korean lawmaker has said.
column4: Jedan je južnokorejski zakonodavac rekao da se broj prebjega iz Sjeverne Koreje u Južnu Koreju smanjio otkad je Kim Jong-un došao na vlast prije sedam godina.

column3: Park Byeong-seug, citing data from the South's unification ministry, said there had been 1,127 defections last year - compared with 2,706 in 2011.
column4: Navodeći podatke iz južnokorejskog Ministarstva za ujedinjenje, Park Byeong-seug je rekao da je prošle godine bilo 1 127 prebjega - u usporedbi s 2 706 u 2011. godini.

column3: Mr Park said tighter border controls between North Korea and China and higher rates charged by people smugglers were key factors.
column4: Park je rekao da su ključni faktori stroža granična kontrola između Sjeverne Koreje i Kine te više cijene koje naplaćuju krijumčari ljudi.

column3: Pyongyang has made no public comments.
column4: Pjongjang nije dao javnu izjavu.

column3: The vast majority of defectors from the North are eventually offered South Korean citizenship.
column4: Većina prebjega sa Sjevera naposljetku dobije južnokorejsko državljanstvo.

column3: Seoul says more than 30,000 North Koreans have illegally crossed the border since the end of the Korean War in 1953.
column4: Seoul kaže da je više od 30 000 Sjevernokorejaca ilegalno prešlo granicu od kraja Korejskog rata 1953. godine.

column3: Most flee via China, which has the longest border with North Korea and is easier to cross than the heavily protected Demilitarised Zone (DMZ) between the two Koreas.
column4: Većina ih pobjegne preko Kine, koja ima najdužu granicu sa Sjevernom Korejom pa se lakše prelazi od dobro čuvane Demilitarizirane zone (DMZ) između dvije Koreje.

column3: China regards the defectors as illegal migrants rather than refugees and often forcibly repatriates them.
column4: Kina prebjege smatra ilegalnim migrantima, a ne izbjeglicama te ih često prisilno repatrira.

column3: Relations between the North and the South - who are still technically at war - have markedly improved in recent months.
column4: Odnosi između Sjevera i Juga - koji zapravo još ratuju - su se posljednjih mjeseci primjetno poboljšali.

column3: Earlier this month, the leaders of the two countries met in Pyongyang for talks that centred on the stalled denuclearisation negotiations.
column4: Početkom ovog mjeseca vođe ove dvije države sreli su se u Pjongjangu kako bi nastavili razgovor o obustavljenim pregovorima o denuklearizaciji.

column3: This came after June's historic meeting between US President Donald Trump and Kim Jong-un in Singapore, when they agreed in broad terms to work towards the nuclear-free Korean peninsula.
column4: Ovo je uslijedilo nakon povijesnog susreta američkog predsjednika Donalda Trumpa i Kima Jong-una u Singapuru, gdje su se u širem smislu složili raditi na stvaranju Korejskog poluotoka bez nuklearnog oružja.

column3: But on Saturday, North Korean Foreign Minister Ri Yong-ho blamed US sanctions for the lack of progress since then.
column4: No u nedjelju je sjevernokorejski ministar vanjskih poslova Ri Yong-ho okrivio sankcije SAD-a za nedostatak napretka otada.

column3: Without any trust in the US, there will be no confidence in our national security and under such circumstances, there is no way we will unilaterally disarm ourselves first, Mr Ri said in a speech to the UN General Assembly in New York.
column4: Bez ikakvog povjerenja u SAD neće biti pouzdanosti u našu nacionalnu sigurnost, a u takvim uvjetima nema šanse da se prvi jednostrano razoružamo, rekao je Ri u svom govoru pred Glavnom skupštinom UN-a u New Yorku.

column3: Man shot multiple times with air rifle in Ilfracombe
column4: ﻿Muškarac nekoliko puta upucan zračnom puškom u Ilfracombeu

column3: A man has been shot multiple times with an air rifle as he walked home from a night out.
column4: Jedan je muškarac nekoliko puta upucan zračnom puškom dok je hodao kući nakon noćnog provoda.

column3: The victim, in his 40s, was in the Oxford Grove area of Ilfracombe, Devon, when he was shot in the chest, abdomen and hand.
column4: Žrtva, muškarac u 40-ima, nalazio se u ulici Oxford Grove u Ilfracombeu u grofoviji Devon kad je upucan u prsa, abdomen i dlan.

column3: Officers described the shooting, which took place at about 02:30 BST, as a "random act."
column4: Policajci su opisali napad, koji se dogodio oko 2:30 po britanskom vremenu, kao „nasumičan čin".

column3: The victim did not see his attacker.
column4: Žrtva nije vidjela napadača.

column3: His injuries are not life-threatening and police have appealed for witnesses.
column4: Žrtvine ozljede nisu opasne po život i policija traži svjedoke.

column3: Midsomer Norton attack: Four attempted murder arrests
column4: ﻿Napad u Midsomer Nortonu: Četiri uhićenja za pokušaj ubojstva

column3: Three teenage boys and a 20-year-old man have been arrested on suspicion of attempted murder after a 16-year-old was found with stab wounds in Somerset.
column4: Tri mladića i 20-godišnji muškarac uhićeni su zbog sumnje na pokušaj ubojstva nakon što je u Somersetu pronađen 16-godišnjak s ubodnim ranama.

column3: The teenage boy was found injured in the Excelsior Terrace area of Midsomer Norton, at about 04:00 BST on Saturday.
column4: Ozlijeđeni je dječak pronađen u području Excelsior Terracea u Midsomer Nortonu, u subotu oko 04:00 sata prema britanskom ljetnom vremenu.

column3: He was taken to hospital where he remains in a "stable" condition.
column4: Prevezen je u bolnicu gdje se i dalje nalazi u stabilnom stanju.

column3: A 17-year-old, two 18-year-olds and a 20-year-old man were arrested overnight in the Radstock area, Avon and Somerset Police said.
column4: 17-godišnjak, dvojica 18-godišnjaka i 20-godišnji muškarac uhićeni su tijekom noći u području Radstocka, rekli su iz Avonske i Somersetske policije.

column3: Officers have appealed for anyone who may have any mobile phone footage of what happened to come forward.
column4: Policija moli bilo koga tko možda ima snimku događaja na mobilnom uređaju da istupi.

column3: Londonderry: Men arrested after house rammed by car
column4: Muškarci uhićeni u sjevernoirskom gradu nakon što su se autom zabili u kuću

column3: Three men, aged 33, 34 and 39, have been arrested after a car was repeatedly rammed into a house in Londonderry.
column4: Trojica muškaraca (33-godišnjak, 34-godišnjak i 39-godišnjak) uhićena su u gradu Londonderryju nakon što su se više puta automobilom zaletili u kuću.

column3: The incident unfolded in Ballynagard Crescent on Thursday at about 19:30 BST.
column4: Napad se odvio u četvrtak u otprilike 19:30 sati po britanskom vremenu.

column3: Det Insp Bob Blemmings said damage was caused to the gates and the building itself.
column4: Inspektor Bob Blemmings izjavio je da su oštećena vanjska ulazna vrata i sama kuća.

column3: A crossbow may also have been fired at the car at some point.
column4: Moguće je i da su u nekom trenutku samostrijelom pucali iz auta.

column3: Wayde Sims shooting: Police arrest suspect Dyteon Simpson in LSU player's death
column4: Ubojstvo Waydea Simsa: Policija uhitila osumnjičenog Dyteona Simpsona za ubojstvo igrača LSU-a

column3: Police have arrested a suspect in the fatal shooting death of Wayde Sims, a 20-year-old basketball player at LSU.
column4: Policija je uhitila osumnjičenika u vezi pucnjave koja je rezultirala smrću Waydea Simsa, dvadesetogodišnjeg košarkaša na LSU-u (Louisiana State University).

column3: Dyteon Simpson, 20, has been arrested and booked into prison on a second-degree murder charge, the Baton Rouge Police Department said.
column4: Dvadesetogodišnji Dyteon Simpson uhićen je i smješten u pritvor zbog optužbe za ubojstvo drugog stupnja, tvrdi policijska uprava Baton Rougea.

column3: Officials released video of the confrontation between Sims and Simpson, and police said Sims lost his glasses during the fight.
column4: Službenici su objavili videozapis sukoba Simsa i Simpsona, a policija tvrdi da je Sims izgubio svoje naočale tijekom tučnjave.

column3: Police recovered the glasses from the scene and said they found Simpson's DNA on them, CBS affiliate WAFB reports.
column4: Policija je pronašla naočale na mjestu zločina te su izjavili da su pronašli Simpsonov DNA na njima, tvrdi CBS-ova podružnica WAFB.

column3: After questioning Simpson, police said he admitted to fatally shooting Wayde.
column4: Simspon je u policijskom ispitivanju priznao da je ustrijelio i tako ubio Waydea.

column3: His bond has been set at $350,000, the Advocate reports.
column4: Njegova je jamčevina postavljena na 350 000 dolara, izjavio je odvjetnik.

column3: The East Baton Rouge Parish Coroner's Office released a preliminary report Friday, saying the cause of death is a gunshot wound to the head into the neck.
column4: Mrtvozornik okruga East Baton Rouge objavio je u petak preliminarno izvješće u kojem stoji da je uzrok smrti prostrijelna rana u glavu i vrat.

column3: The department is crediting the Louisiana State Police fugitive task force, the state police crime lab, Southern University police and area citizens in assisting in the investigation leading to the arrest.
column4: Policijska uprava zahvaljuje državnoj policiji Louisiane, tj. njenoj specijalnoj jedinici za bjegunce, laboratoriju državne policije, policiji sveučilišta Southern University i građanima na pomoći u istrazi koja je dovela do uhićenja.

column3: LSU athletic director Joe Alleva thanked area law enforcement for its "diligence and pursuit of justice."
column4: Joe Alleva, sportski direktor LSU-a, zahvalio je zaslužnim policijskim djelatnicima na njihovoj "marljivosti i potrazi za pravdom".

column3: Sims was 20 years old.
column4: Sims je imao 20 godina.

column3: The 6-foot-6 forward grew up in Baton Rouge, where his father, Wayne, also played basketball for LSU.
column4: Sims, visok 198 cm, odrastao je u Baton Rougeu gdje je njegov otac Wayde također igrao košarku za LSU.

column3: He averaged 5.6 points and 2.6 rebounds a game last season.
column4: U prosjeku bi postizao 5,6 poena i 2,6 skokova po utakmici.

column3: On Friday morning, LSU basketball coach Will Wade said the team is "devastated" and "in shock" by Wayde's death.
column4: Košarkaški trener LSU-a Will Wade je u petak ujutro izjavio da je tim "shrvan" i "šokiran" Waydeovom smrću.

column3: This is what you worry about at all times, Wade said.
column4: O ovakvim se stvarima uvijek brineš, rekao je Wade.

column3: Nancy Pelosi calls Brett Kavanaugh "hysterical," says he is unfit to serve on the Supreme Court
column4: ﻿Nancy Pelosi nazvala Bretta Kavanaugha „histeričnim“, tvrdi da nije u stanju biti sucem Vrhovnog suda.

column3: House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi called Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh "hysterical" and said that he was temperamentally unfit to serve on the Supreme Court.
column4: Voditeljica demokrata Nancy Pelosi nazvala je kandidata za suca Vrhovnog suda Bretta Kavanaugha „histeričnim“ te je dodala da on trenutno nije u stanju služiti Vrhovnom sudu.

column3: Pelosi made the comments in an interview Saturday at the Texas Tribune Festival in Austin, Texas.
column4: Tu je izjavu dala u subotnjem intervjuu na Texas Tribune festivalu koji se održao u Austinu u Teksasu.

column3: I couldn't help but think that if a woman had ever performed that way, they would say 'hysterical,' Pelosi said about her reaction to Kavanaugh's testimony before the Senate Judiciary Committee on Thursday.
column4: „Nisam se mogla suzdržati od pomisli da, da je tako postupila jedna žena, sigurno bi  ju nazvali „histeričnom““, tako je Pelosi objasnila svoju reakciju na Kavanaughovo svjedočenje pred Senatovim Odborom za pravosuđe prošlog četvrtka.

column3: Kavanaugh emotionally denied allegations that he had sexually assaulted Dr. Christine Blasey Ford when they were both teenagers.
column4: Kavanaugh je emotivno porekao optužbe o tome da je seksualno zlostavljao Christine Blasey kad su bili tinjedžeri.

column3: During his opening statement, Kavanaugh was very emotional, at times nearly shouting and choking up while discussing his family and his high school years.
column4: Kavanaugh je bio vrlo emotivan tijekom svoje uvodne izjave, povremeno se skoro derao i pucao mu je glas dok je govorio o svojoj obitelji i o svojim srednjoškolskim danima.

column3: He also explicitly condemned Democrats on the committee, calling the allegations against him a "grotesque and coordinated character assassination" organized by liberals angry that Hillary Clinton lost the 2016 presidential election.
column4: Također je izričito ukorio demokrate u odboru, a optužbe protiv sebe nazvao je „grotesknim i koordiniranim blaćenjem“ koje su organizirali liberalci ljuti što je Hillary Clinton izgubila izbore 2016. godine.

column3: Pelosi said that she believed Kavanaugh's testimony proved that he could not serve on the Supreme Court, because it showed that he is biased against Democrats.
column4: Pelosi tvrdi da je Kavanaughovo svjedočenje dokaz da on nije u stanju služiti na Vrhovnom sudu, zato što je pokazao opredjeljenje protiv demokrata.

column3: I think that he disqualifies himself with those statements and the manner in which he went after the Clintons and the Democrats, she said.
column4: „Smatram da je samog sebe diskvalificirao za taj posao svojim izjavama i načinom na koji je napao Clintone i demokrate.“

column3: Pelosi demurred when asked if she would try to impeach Kavanaugh if he is confirmed, and if Democrats gain the majority in the House of Representatives.
column4: Pelosi se pokolebala kad su je pitali bi li probala opozvati Kavanaugha ukoliko bude imenovan i ako demokrati osvoje većinu mjesta u Zastupničkom domu.

column3: I will say this -- if he is not telling the truth to Congress or to the FBI, then he's not fit not only to be on the Supreme Court, but to be on the court he's on right now, Pelosi said.
column4: „No ovo ću reći – ako on nije spreman reći istinu pred Kongresom ili FBI-u, onda nije u stanju ne samo služiti na Vrhovnom sudu, već i raditi na svojoj trenutnoj poziciji.“

column3: Kavanaugh is currently a judge on the D.C. Circuit Court of Appeals.
column4: Kavanaugh je trenutno sudac na Okružnom sudu za žalbe u Washgington D.C.-u.

column3: Pelosi added that as a Democrat she was concerned about potential Kavanaugh rulings against the Affordable Care Act or Roe v. Wade, as he is considered to be a conservative justice.
column4: Pelosi je dodala da ju kao demokrata brinu presude koje bi Kavanugh mogao donijeti po pitanju „Zakona o prihvatljivoj brizi“ („Affordable Care Act“) ili u slučaju Roe protiv Wadea, zato što on glasi kao konzervativni sudac.

column3: In his confirmation hearings, Kavanaugh sidestepped questions on whether he would overturn certain Supreme Court decisions.
column4: Na svojem je potvrdnom saslušanju Kavanaugh izbjegavao pitanja o tome bi li poništio odluke Vrhovnog suda.

column3: It's not time for a hysterical, biased person to go to the court and expect us to say, 'isn't that wonderful,' Pelosi said.
column4: „Ovo nije vrijeme kad bismo trebali dopustiti histeričnoj, pristranoj osobi da služi na sudu i očekuje da kažemo kako je to divno“, rekla je Pelosi.

column3: Lindsey Graham, John Kennedy tell "60 Minutes" whether the FBI's investigation of Kavanaugh could change their minds
column4: „60 minuta“ - Lindsay Graham i John Kennedy otkrili hoće li se predomisliti nakon FBI-jeve istrage Kavanaugha

column3: The FBI investigation into accusations against Judge Brett Kavanaugh has delayed a final vote on his nomination to the Supreme Court by at least a week, and raises the question of whether the bureau's findings could sway any Republican senators into pulling their support.
column4: FBI-jeva istraga optužbi protiv suca Bretta Kavanaugha odgodila je posljednje glasovanje o njegovom imenovanju na mjesto suca Vrhovnog suda za najmanje tjedan dana, te se pojavilo pitanje mogu li rezultati istrage navesti ijednog republikanskog senatora da povuče podršku Kavanaughu .

column3: In an interview airing Sunday, "60 Minutes" correspondent Scott Pelley asked Republicans Sens. John Kennedy and Lindsey Graham whether the FBI could unearth anything that would lead them to change their minds.
column4: Dopisnik emisije „60 minuta“ Scott Pelley u subotnjem je intervjuu upitao republikanske senatore Lindseyja Grahama i Johna Kennedyja bi li FBI mogao otkriti bilo što što bi ih moglo navesti da se predomisle.

column3: Kennedy appeared more open than his colleague from South Carolina.
column4: Kennedy se činio otvorenijim od svojeg kolege iz Južne Karoline.

column4: „Mislim , naravno da bi“ , rekao je Kennedy.

column3: Almanac: The inventor of the Geiger Counter
column4: Almanah: izumitelj Geigerovog brojača

column3: And now a page from our "Sunday Morning" Almanac: September 30, 1882, 136 years ago today, and COUNTING ... the day the future physicist Johannes Wilhelm "Hans" Geiger was born in Germany.
column4: A sada stranica iz našeg „Saturday Morning“ almanaha: 30. rujna 1882., na današnji dan prije 136 godina… dan kada je budući fizičar Johannes Wilhelm „Hans“ Geiger rođen u Njemačkoj.

column3: Geiger developed a method for detecting and measuring radioactivity, an invention that eventually led to the device known as the Geiger Counter.
column4: Geiger je razvio metodu za otkrivanje i mjerenje radioaktivnosti, izum koji će jednog dana dovesti do uređaja koji poznajemo pod imenom Geigerov brojač.

column3: A mainstay of science ever since, the Geiger Counter became a pop culture mainstay as well, as in the 1950 movie "Bells of Coronado," starring those seemingly unlikely cowpoke scientists Roy Rogers and Dale Evans:
column4: Glavno uporište znanosti do današnjeg dana, Geigerov brojač postao je također i uporištem popularne kulture, kao u filmu iz 1950. „Bells of Coronado“, s naizgled neočekivanim kaubojima-znanstvenicima Royjom  Rogersom i Daleom Evansom u glavnim ulogama:

column3: Man: "What in the world is that?"
column4: Muškarac: „Što je dovraga to?“

column3: Rogers: "It's a Geiger Counter, used to locate radioactive minerals, such as uranium.
column4: Rogers: „To je Geigerov brojač, koristi se za otkrivanje radioaktivnih minerala kao što je uranij.

column3: When you put these earphones on, you can actually hear the effects of the atoms given off by the radioactivity in the minerals."
column4: Kad stavite ove slušalice na uši možete čuti djelovanje atoma koje emitira radioaktivnost u mineralima.“

column3: Evans: "Say, it sure is popping now!"
column4: Evans: „Stvarno, baš luduje sada!“

column3: Hans Geiger died in 1945, just a few days short of his 63rd birthday.
column4: „Hans“ Geiger umro je 1945., svega par dana prije svog 62. rođendana.

column3: But the invention that bears his name lives on.
column4: Ali izum koji nosi njegovo ime i dalje živi.

column3: Immanuel Christian School: Sixth-grade boys accused of pinning down black girl and cutting off her dreadlocks in Virginia
column4: Katolička škola Immanuel: Dječaci iz šestog razreda optuženi da su oborili crnu djevojčicu i odrezali joj dreadlockse u Virginiji

column3: A black middle school student from Virginia is accusing three white boys of pinning her down and cutting off her dreadlocks. The incident took place at Immanuel Christian School - where Vice President Mike Pence's wife, Karen Pence, is a teacher.
column4: Crna osnovnoškolka iz Virginije optužila je trojicu bijelih dječaka da su ju oborili i odrezali joj dreadlockse. Ovaj nemili događaj odigrao se u Katoličkoj školi Immanuel, gdje žena potpredsjednika Mikea Pencea Karen Pence radi kao učiteljica.

column3: Amari Allen, a 12-year-old student at the private K-12 Christian school, said the boys called her dreadlocks "ugly" and "nappy" before cutting them off on the playground during recess.
column4: Amari Allen, dvanaestogodišnja učenica u privatnoj K-12 Katoličkoj školi, rekla je da su dječaci nazvali njene dreadlocske "ružnima" i "neurednima" prije nego što su ih odrezali na igralištu tijekom odmora.

column3: They kept laughing and calling me names, Amari told CBS affiliate WUSA-TV, tearing up. "They called me 'ugly,' said, 'I shouldn't have been born.' They called me 'an attention-seeker.'"
column4: Amari je u suzama rekla reporterima WUSA-TV-a da su "nastavili smijati se i izrugivati me". "Rekli su da sam 'ružna' i da se 'nikada nisam trebala roditi'. Rekli su mi da sam 'željna pažnje'".

column3: According to WUSA, one of the boys allegedly covered Amari's mouth while another held her hands behind her back and a third took a pair of scissors to her dreadlocks.
column4: Novinari WUSA-e navode da je jedan od dječaka navodno pokrio Amarina usta dok joj je drugi držao ruke iza leđa, a treći škarama odrezao njene dreadlockse.

column3: Amari didn't tell her family about the incident until after her grandmother noticed the length of her hair had changed.
column4: Amari svojoj obitelji nije rekla ništa o tom incidentu dok njena baka nije primijetila da joj je kosa kraća.

column3: They ran off laughing, and I was just sitting there, Amari said.
column4: Smijali su se i otrčali, a ja sam mogla samo sjediti, rekla je Amari.

column3: The alleged incident occurred on Monday, but the shy preteen said she didn't tell her family about it until Wednesday, after her grandmother noticed her hair looked different. She feared retaliation if she confessed the truth, she said.
column4: Navodni incident dogodio se u ponedjeljak, ali ova sramežljiva djevojčica svojoj obitelji nije ništa rekla do srijede, nakon što je njena baka primijetila da joj kosa izgleda drugačije. Rekla je da se bojala odmazde ako ikome kaže.

column3: It's very painful, said Cynthia Allen, Amari's grandmother. "I want to see them dismissed from the school. I want to see something done."
column4: Jako je bolno, rekla je Cynthia Allen, Amarina baka. "Želim da ih izbace iz škole. Želim da se nešto učini".

column3: Allen's family pays nearly $12,000 per year for Amari to attend the school, which made headlines earlier this year after Karen Pence took an art teaching job at the famously anti-LGBTQ institution.
column4: Njena obitelj plaća 12 000 dolara godišnje kako bi Amari pohađala ovu školu, koja je dospjela u novine nakon što je ranije ove godine Karen Pence postala učiteljica likovnog u ovoj notorno anti-LGBTQ instituciji.

column3: We take seriously the emotional and physical well-being of all our students, and have a zero-tolerance policy for any kind of bullying or abuse, Immanuel Christian School said in a statement. "We are deeply disturbed by the allegations being made, and are in communication with the family of the alleged victim to gather information and provide whatever support we can. We have also reached out to law enforcement to ask them to conduct a thorough investigation, and further inquiries should be directed to the Fairfax County Police."
column4: Ozbiljno shvaćamo emocionalno i fizičko zdravlje svih naših učenika i provodimo politiku nulte tolerancije prema bilo kakvom nasilju ili zlostavljanju, stoji u izjavi Katoličke škole Immanuel. "Duboko smo uzdrmani ovim optužbama te razgovaramo s obitelji navodne žrtve kako bismo skupili informacije i pružili kakvugod podršku možemo. Također smo se obratili tijelima kaznenog progona i zatražili da provedu temeljitu istragu te bi daljnji upiti trebali biti upućeni Policijskoj upravi okruga Fairfax."

column3: While the school has a zero-tolerance policy for bullying, Amari said the boys had previously tormented her. She said that the boys have taken her lunch and called her names in the past.
column4: Dok škola tvrdi da provodi politiku nulte tolerancije prema nasilju, Amari kaže da su je dječaci napadali i u prošlosti. Rekla je da su joj dječaci uzimali užinu i vrijeđali ju i prije.

column3: Amari's family met with school officials Thursday, and the investigation is ongoing.
column4: Amarina obitelj sastala se sa službenicima iz škole u četvrtak, a istraga je još u tijeku.

column3: Midway Broadcasting announced today that its Chairwoman, Melody Spann Cooper is set to release her highly anticipated book to help female entrepreneurs and executives thrive in business. "The Girlfriend's Guide To Closing the Deal" shares insights on how women can use their voice to achieve equity at the negotiating table and advance their careers by using the female edition of the old-boy's network.
column4: Tvrtka Midway Broadcasting danas je objavila da će njihova direktorica Melody Spann Cooper uskoro izdati dugo očekivanu knjigu koja će pomoći poduzetnicama i ženama na izvršnim pozicijama da napreduju u poslu. Knjiga Vodič prijateljice za sklapanje posla (eng. The Girlfriend's Guide to Closing the Deal) kako žene mogu koristiti svoj glas da se izbore za jednakost za pregovaračkim stolom i napreduju u svojim karijerama pomoću ženske verzije networkinga među muškarcima koji su pohađali isti fakultet.

column3: Throughout the book, Spann Cooper uses anecdotal references to deal with challenging issues including the #MeToo movement and Hillary Clinton's Presidential defeat and its impact on fueling the female empowerment in America.
column4: Kroz cijelu knjigu Spann Cooper navodi anegdotalne primjere kako se nositi s problemima, uključujući i #MeToo pokret i poraz Hillary Clinton na izborima i utjecaj istog na osnaživanje žena u Americi.

column3: The self-published book is the result of a groundbreaking self-entitled speech that Spann Cooper delivered as a keynote address at The National Association of Women Business Owners Conference in Chicago in 2017. The Girlfriend's Guide to Closing The Deal is written in a down-to-earth style that every "girlfriend" can relate.
column4: Knjiga koju je Spann Cooper sama izdala rezultat je revolucionarnog govora koji je ona održala na konferenciji Nacionalnog udruženja poduzetnica 2017. godine. Knjiga je napisana jednostavnim stilom s kojim se svaka cura može poistovjetiti.

column3: Christie Hefner, businesswoman and daughter of Playboy Founder, Hugh Hefner, says "The Girlfriend's Guide to Closing The Deal" is both highly entertaining and very helpful. Melody weaves together personal anecdotes, triumphs, and setbacks with useful lessons learned. From how to own your ideas in a meeting to when its time to "friend up," everyone can benefit from Melody's story."
column4: Christie Hefner, poduzetnica i kćer osnivača Playboya Hugha Hefnera, rekla je da je Vodič prijateljice za sklapanje posla ujedno jako zabavna i jako korisna. Melody povezuje anegdote iz vlastitog života, trijumfe, prepreke i naučene lekcije. Od toga kako se zauzeti za svoje ideje na sastanku do toga kad je vrijeme za udruživanje s kolegama, svatko može imati koristi od Melodyjine priče."

column3: As Chairman of Midway Broadcasting Corporation, she joined an elite list of America's female broadcast owners after purchasing the company's controlling interest in 1999. Midway Broadcasting Corporation is a best-in-class female and family-owned media boutique whose properties include radio and interactive platforms.
column4: Kao direktorica tvrtke Midway Broadcasting Corporation, našla se na elitnoj listi američkih vlasnica medijskih kuća nakon što je kupila kontrolni udio tvrtke 1999. godine. Midway Broadcasting Corporation je najbolja ženska i obiteljska medijska kuća sa specijaliziranim uslugama koja posjeduje radijske postaje i interaktivne platforme.

column3: The book was co-written with T. Shawn Taylor, journalist, writer and founder of Tree Top Consulting, a full-service media consulting firm.
column4: Koautorica knjige je T.Shawn Taylor, novinarka, autorica i osnivačica Tree Top Consultinga, tvrtke koja pruža punu uslugu medijskog savjetovanja.

column3: The House voted Friday to block the national emergency declaration President Donald Trump is using to fund his proposed border wall.
column4: U Zastupničkom su domu u petak izglasali protiv proglašenja izvanrednog stanja kojim američki predsjednik Donald Trump financira izgradnju predloženog zida na granici s Meksikom.

column3: The Democratic-held chamber passed a resolution to terminate Trump's action by a 236-174 margin, sending it to the president. Eleven Republicans and one independent supported it. The Senate already approved the measure in a 54-41 vote, as 11 Republicans joined Democrats in backing it.
column4: Donji dom američkog parlamenta, u kojem demokrati imaju većinu, usvojio je s 236 glasova za i 174 protiv rezoluciju kojom se prekida Trumpovo proglašenje, a zatim je proslijedio predsjedniku. 11 republikanaca i jedan nezavisni zastupnik glasali su za rezoluciju. Senat ju je već odobrio s 54 glasova za i 41 protiv, s obzirom da se 11 republikanca pridružilo demokratima u podržavanju rezolucije.

column3: Trump will likely veto the resolution, the sixth time he will have blocked congressional legislation as president. He already vetoed a measure to end the emergency declaration in March.
column4: Trump će vjerojatno staviti veto na rezoluciju, što će biti šesti put da je kao predsjednik blokirao zakonodavne odluke Kongresa. Već je u ožujku stavio veto na mjeru kojom bi se ukinulo proglašenje izvanrednog stanja.

column3: Neither chamber of Congress appears to have the two-thirds majority needed to override the president's opposition.
column4: Čini se da nijedan od dva doma Kongresa nema dvotrećinsku većinu potrebnu za poništavanje predsjednikova veta.

column3: Failing to get the funding he desired for borders on the southern border from both the Mexican government and Congress, Trump declared the national emergency in February. His administration plans to pull $3.6 billion from military construction to fund border projects.
column4: Nakon što nije uspio dobiti sredstva za podizanje zida na južnoj granici ni od meksičke vlade ni od Kongresa, Trump je u veljači proglasio izvanredno stanje. Trumpova administracija planira upotrijebiti 3,6 milijardi dolara vojnih građevinskih sredstava za gradnju zida.

column3: Democrats have accused Trump of both circumventing Congress' power of the purse and raiding key Defense funds for unnecessary barriers. A handful of Republicans in both the House and Senate also had concerns about the precedent Trump's declaration would set for executive overreach in the future.
column4: Demokrati su optužili Trumpa za zaobilaženje ovlasti Kongresa da kontrolira troškove i za uzimanje ključnih sredstava za obranu radi izgradnje nepotrebnih granica. Nekolicina republikanaca u Zastupničkom domu i u Senatu također je zabrinuto zbog presedana koje bi Trumpovo proglašenje postavilo za kršenje izvršnih ovlasti u budućnosti.

column3: Some Senate Republicans facing elections next year have faced sharp political pressure over the national emergency vote.
column4: Neki republikanci iz Senata pred kojima su izbori iduće godine suočavaju se s velikim političkim pritiskom zbog proglašenja izvanrednog stanja.

column3: North Korea says nuclear disarmament won't come unless it can trust US
column4: Sjeverna Koreja kaže da do nuklearnog razoružanja neće doći ako ne može vjerovati SAD-u

column3: North Korean Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho says his nation will never disarm its nuclear weapons first if it can't trust Washington.
column4: Ministar vanjskih poslova Sjeverne Koreje Ri Yong Ho tvrdi da njegova zemlja neće prva krenuti s procesom nuklearnog razoružanja ako ne može vjerovati Washingtonu.

column3: Ri was speaking Saturday at the United Nations General Assembly.
column4: Ri je održao govor na samitu Ujedinjenih Naroda u subotu.

column3: He called on the United States to follow through on promises made during a summit in Singapore between the rivals' leaders.
column4: Pozvao je SAD da ispuni obećanja dana tijekom samita u Singapuru između dvaju rivalskih vođa.

column3: His comments come as US. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo seems to be on the verge of restarting deadlocked nuclear diplomacy more than three months after the Singapore with North Korea's Kim Jong Un.
column4: Njegov poziv dolazi u vrijeme kada se čini da je američki državni tajnik Mike Pompeo na rubu ponovnog pokretanja nuklearne diplomacije koja je došla na mrtvu točku i to više od tri mjeseca nakon singapurskog samita sa sjevernokorejskim vođom Kim Jong Unom.

column3: Ri says it's a "pipe dream" that continued sanctions and U.S. objection to a declaration ending the Korean War will ever bring the North to its knees.
column4: Ri kaže da je "obična maštarija" misliti da će kontinuirane sankcije i protivljenje SAD-a deklaraciji o kraju Korejskog rata ikad baciti Sjevernu Koreju na koljena.

column3: Washington is wary of agreeing to the declaration without Pyongyang first making significant disarmament moves.
column4: Washington ne želi pristati na deklaraciju dok Pyongyang ne pokrene konkretne poteze vezane za razoružanje.

column3: Both Kim and U.S. President Donald Trump want a second summit.
column4: I Kim Yong Un i američki predsjednik Donald Trump žele drugi samit.

column3: But there is widespread skepticism that Pyongyang is serious about renouncing an arsenal that the country likely sees as the only way to guarantee its safety.
column4: Međutim, sumnja se da Pyongyang ozbiljno namjerava odreći se arsenala oružja koji država vjerojatno smatra jedinim načinom koji joj garantira sigurnost.

column3: Pompeo is planning to visit Pyongyang next month to prepare for a second Kim-Trump summit.
column4: Pompeo sljedeći mjesec planira posjetiti Pyongyang da bi se pripremio za novi samit Kim Yong Una i Trumpa.

column3: Outside money floods into tightest midterm election House races
column4: Novac izvana preplavio tijesnu izbornu utrku za zastupnički dom

column3: It's not surprising that Pennsylvania's 17th is seeing a flood of cash, thanks to a realignment of a congressional districts that landed two incumbents in a race for the same seat.
column4: Nije iznenađujuće da sedamnaesti okrug Pennsylvania bilježi priljev novca, zahvaljujući preustroju kongresnih izbornih jedinica koje su ubacile dva službenika u utrku za istu poziciju.

column3: This recently redrawn suburban Pittsburg district pits Democrat Rep. Conor Lamb - who won his seat in another district in a special election last spring.
column4: Ovaj prigradski okrug Pittsburgha, koji je nedavno prepravljen, suprotstavlja se demokratskom zastupniku Conoru Lambu-koji je osvojio mjesto u drugom okrugu u izvanrednim izborima prošlog proljeća.

column3: Lamb is running against another incumbent, Republican Keith Rothfus, who currently represents the old Pennsylvania 12th district, which overlaps heavily with the new 17th.
column4: Lamb se natječe protiv drugog trenutnog službenika, republikanca Keitha Rothfusa, koji trenutno predstavlja stari dvanaesti okrug Pennsylvania , a koji se uvelike preklapa s novim sedamnaestim.

column3: The maps were redrawn after the Pennsylvania Supreme Court ruled in January that the old districts were unconstitutionally gerrymandered in Republicans' favor.
column4: Karte su prepravljene nakon što je Vrhovni sud Pennsylvanije u siječnju presudio da su stari okruzi protuustavno podijeljeni u korist republikanaca.

column3: The race in the new 17th has touched off a campaign finance slugfest between the major party finance arms, the Democratic Campaign Congressional Committee (DCCC) and the National Republican Campaign Committee (NRCC).
column4: Utrka u novom sedamnaestom okrugu potaknula je ljutnju zbog financiranja kampanje među glavnim stranačkim instrumentima financiranja, Demokratskog kongresnog odbora za kampanju (Democratic Campaign Congressional Committee ) i Nacionalnog republikanskog odbora za kampanju (National Republican Campaign Committee).

column3: Lamb became a familiar name in Pennsylvania after a narrow win in a widely watched in March special election for Pennsylvania's 18th Congressional District.
column4: Lamb je postao poznato ime u Pennsylvaniji nakon tijesne pobjede na uvelike gledanim izvanrednim izborima u ožujku za osamnaesti kongresni okrug Pennsylvania.

column3: That seat had been held by a Republican for over a decade, and President Donald Trump won the district by 20 points.
column4: To mjesto držao je republikanac više od deset godina, a predsjednik Donald Trump osvojio je okrug s 20 bodova.

column3: Political pundits have given Democrats a slight edge.
column4: Politički su stručnjaci demokratima dali blagu prednost.

column3: Red Tide Update: Concentrations decrease in Pinellas, Manatee and Sarasota
column4: Novosti o cvjetanju mora: koncentracije padaju u okruzima Pinellas, Manatee i Sarasota

column3: The newest report from the Florida Fish and Wildlife Commission shows a general decrease in Red Tide concentrations for parts of the Tampa Bay area.
column4: Najnovija izvješća od Komisije za lov i ribolov na Floridi ukazuju na generalni pad koncentracije algi u nekim dijelovima zaljeva Tampa.

column3: According to the FWC, patchier bloom conditions are being reported in areas of Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Charlotte and Collier counties - which suggests decreasing concentrations.
column4: Komisija navodi da su neujednačeniji uvjeti za cvjetanje mora zabilježeni u područjima okruga Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Charlotte i Collier – što ukazuje na smanjenje koncentracija.

column3: A bloom the Red Tide extends approximately 130 miles of coastline from northern Pinellas to southern Lee counties.
column4: Područje cvjetanja mora proteže se na otprilike 210 kilometara morske obale od Pinellasa na sjeveru do okruga Lee na jugu.

column3: Patches can be found about 10 miles offshore of Hillsborough County, but at fewer sites relative to last week.
column4: Pojasevi se nalaze otprilike 16 kilometara od obale okruga Hillsborough, ali na manje mjesta u odnosu na prošli tjedan.

column3: Red Tide has also been observed in Pasco County.
column4: Cvjetanje mora zabilježeno je i okrugu Pasco.

column3: Medium concentrations in or offshore of Pinellas County have been reported in the past week, low to high concentrations offshore of Hillsborough County, background to high concentrations in Manatee County, background to high concentrations in or offshore of Sarasota County, background to medium concentrations in Charlotte County, background to high concentrations in or offshore of Lee County, and low concentrations in Collier County.
column4: Srednje koncentracije zabilježene su u okrugu Pinellasi i njegovim priobalnim područjima, niska do visoka koncentracija u priobalnom području okruga Hillsborough, pozadinske do visoke koncentracije u okrugu Manatee, pozadinske do visoke koncentracije u okrugu Sarasota i njegovu priobalnom području, pozadinske do srednje koncentracije u okrugu Charlotte, pozadinske do visoke koncentracije u okrugu Lee i njegovu priobalnom području te niske koncentracije u okrugu Collier.

column3: Respiratory irritation continues to be reported in Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Lee, and Collier counties.
column4: I dalje se bilježe pritužbe na nadraženost dišnog sustava u okruzima Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Lee i Collier.

column3: Respiratory irritation was not reported in Northwest Florida over the past week.
column4: Nadraženost dišnog sustava nije prijavljena na sjeverozapadu Floride unazad tjedan dana.

column3: <!-- error parsing file '/home/katja/saar/vartra/eamt-maja/news/selection/en/cnn.304400' -->

column3: Thieves take $26,750 during ATM refill at Newport on the Levee
column4: Lopovi ukrali 165.500 kuna tijekom punjenja bankomata u Newport on the Leveeu

column3: Thieves on Friday morning stole $26,750 from a Brink's worker refilling an ATM at Newport on the Levee, according to a news release from the Newport Police Department.
column4: Lopovi su u petak ujutro ukrali 165.500 kuna radniku Brink's-a koji je punio bankomat u Newport on the Leveeu, izvjestila je policija Newporta.

column3: The car's driver had been emptying an ATM in the entertainment complex and preparing to deliver more money, Det. Dennis McCarthy wrote in the release.
column4: Vozač automobila prazino je bankomat u zabavnom centru i pripremao se za dostavu još novaca, napisao je detektiv Dennis McCarthy u svom izvještaju.

column3: While he was occupied, another man "ran up from behind the Brink's employee" and stole a bag of money meant for delivery.
column4: Dok se bavio time, drugi muškarac "dotrčao je s leđa radniku Brink's-a" i ukrao vreću novaca koju je trebao dostaviti.

column3: Witnesses spotted multiple suspects fleeing the scene, according to the release, but police did not specify the number involved in the incident.
column4: Svjedoci su primijetili nekoliko osumnjičenih kako bježe s mjesta zločina, stoji u izvještaju, ali policija nije navela broj ljudi uključenih u ovaj slučaj.

column3: Anyone with information about their identities should contact Newport police at 859-292-3680.
column4: Bilo tko s informacijama o njihovom identitetu neka kontaktira policiju Newporta na broj 859-292-3680.

column3: Trump rallies in West Virginia
column4: ﻿Skupovi potpore Trumpu u zapadnoj Virginiji

column3: The President obliquely referred to the situation surrounding his Supreme Court pick Brett Kavanaugh while talking about the importance of Republican turnout in the midterm elections.
column4: Predsjednik se indirektno osvrnuo na situaciju oko svog izbora kandidata za vrhovni sud - Bretta Kavanaugha - govoreći o važnosti odaziva republikanaca na predstojećim među izborima.

column3:
All of what we've done is at stake in November.	„Sve što smo postigli bit će stavljeno na kocku u studenom. 
cnn.304447	st08	Five weeks away from one of the most important elections in our lifetimes.	Još pet tjedana do najvažnijih izbora naših života. 
cnn.304447	st08	This is one of the big, big -- I'm not running but I'm really running that's why I'm all over the place fighting for great candidates, he said.
column4: Možda jednih od najvećih.. Ne kandidiram se, ali kao da se kandidiram, zato se posvuda borim za sjajne kandidate“, rekao je.

column3: Trump continued, "You see this horrible, horrible radical group of Democrats, you see it happening right now.
column4: „Vidite li ovu užasnu, užasnu radikalnu skupinu demokrata, vidite da se to sada događa.

column3: And they're determined to take back power by using any means necessary, you see the meanness, the nastiness.
column4: I odlučni su da vrate moć korištenjem svih potrebnih sredstava, vidite podlost, gadost.

column3: They don't care who they hurt, who they have to run over in order to get power and control, that's what they want is power and control, we're not going to give it to them."
column4: Nije ih briga koga će povrijediti, koga moraju pregaziti da bi dobili moć i kontrolu, to je ono što oni žele, moć i kontrolu, nećemo im to dati“, nastavio je.

column3: Democrats, he said, are on a mission to "resist and obstruct."
column4: Demokrati su, rekao je, na misiji da „se odupru i opstruiraju“.

column3: And you see that over the last four days, he said, calling the Democrats "angry and mean and nasty and untruthful."
column4: „I to je bilo vidljivo ova posljednja četiri dana“, rekao je, nazvavši demokrate „bijesnim i podlim, gadnim i neiskrenim“.

column3: He referenced Senate Judiciary Committee ranking Democratic Sen. Dianne Feinstein by name, which received loud boos from the audience.
column4: Pozivao se na Senatski pravosudni odbor koji je poimence rangirao senatoricu demokrata Dianne Feinstein, na što je publika ljutito reagirala.

column3:
Remember her answer?	„Sjećate se njezina odgovora?
