column4: Ne, ovaj ne, čekajte malo - to je bio stvarno loš govor tijela - najgori govor tijela koji sam ikad vidio.“

column3: Sarah Palin cites Track Palin's PTSD at Donald Trump rally
column4: Sarah Palin osvrnula se na Track Palinov PTSP na skupu Donalda Trumpa

column3: Track Palin, 26, spent a year in Iraq after enlisting on Sept.
column4: Dvadesetšestogišnji Track Palin proveo je godinu dana u Iraku nakon što je regrutiran u rujnu.

column3: He was arrested and charged in a domestic violence incident on Monday night
column4: Uhićen je u ponedeljak navečer te je podignuta optužnica protiv njega u slučaju obiteljskog nasilja.

column3: What my own son is going through, what he is going through coming back, I can relate to other families who feel ramifications of PTSD and some of the woundedness that our soldiers do return with, she told the audience at a rally for Donald Trump in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
column4: „Što moj sin trenutno proživljava, što proživljava od kada se vratio, mogu suosjećati s drugim obiteljima koje osjećaju posljedice PTSP-a i donekle s boli s kojom se naši vojnici vraćaju." kazala je Sarah Palin publici na skupu Donalda Trumpa u Tulsi u Oklahomi.

column3: Palin called his arrest "the elephant in the room" and said of her son and other war veterans, "they come back a bit different, they come back hardened, they come back wondering if there is that respect for what it is that their fellow soldiers and airmen, and every other member of the military, has given to the country."
column4: Sinovo je uhićenje nazvala „neugodnom, ali očitom temom" te je za svog sina i druge ratne veterane rekla da se „vraćaju malo drugačiji, vraćaju se otupjeli, vraćaju se i pitaju postoji li poštovanje prema onome što su njihovi suborci ili bilo koji drugi član vojske dali ovoj zemlji."

column3: He was arrested on Monday in Wasilla, Alaska, and charged with domestic violence assault on a female, interfering with a report of domestic violence and possession of a weapon while intoxicated, according to Dan Bennett, a spokesman for the Wasilla Police Department.
column4: Track Palin uhićen je u ponedjeljak u Wasilli u Aljasci i optužen za obiteljsko nasilje u kojem se dogodio napad na žensku osobu, ometanje prijave obiteljskog nasilja i posjedovanje oružja u alkoholiziranom stanju rekao je Dan Bennett, glasnogovornik policije u Wasilli.

column3: Trump says Kavanaugh 'suffered, the meanness, the anger' of the Democratic Party
column4: Kavanaugh je „trpio zlobu i ljutnju“ Demokratske stranke, kaže Trump

column3: A vote for Judge Kavanaugh is a vote to reject the ruthless and outrageous tactics of the Democratic Party, Trump said at a rally in Wheeling, West Virginia.
column4: „Glasovati za suca Kavanaugha znači glasovati za neprihvaćanje nemilosrdnih i nepoštenih taktika Demokratske stranke“, rekao je Trump na protestu u Wheelingu u zapadnoj Virginiji.

column3: Trump said that Kavanaugh has "suffered the meanness, the anger" of the Democratic Party throughout his nomination process.
column4: Trump je rekao da je Kavanaugh „trpio zlobu i ljutnju“ Demokratske stranke tijekom cijelog postupka imenovanja.

column3: Kavanaugh testified before Congress on Thursday, forcefully and emotionally denying an allegation from Christine Blasey Ford that he sexually assaulted her decades ago when they were teenagers.
column4: Kavanaugh je u četvrtak svjedočio pred Kongresom. Uvjerljivo je i duboko porekao tvrdnje Christine Blasey Ford da ju je u prošlosti, kada su još bili tinejdžeri, seksualno zlostavljao.

column3: Ford also testified at the hearing about her allegation.
column4: Ford je također svjedočila na saslušanju.

column3: The President said on Saturday that the "American people saw the brilliant and quality and courage" of Kavanaugh that day.
column4: Predsjednik Trump u subotu je rekao da je „američki narod tog dana svjedočio Kavanaughovoj izvrsnosti, kvalitetu i hrabrosti“.

column3: A vote to confirm Judge Kavanaugh is a vote to confirm one of the most accomplished legal minds of our time, a jurist with a sterling record of public service, he told the crowd of West Virginia supporters.
column4: „Glasovati za suca Kavanaugha znači glasovati za jednog od najuspješnijih pravnih umova našeg vremena, za pravnika s izvrsnom poviješću javnog djelovanja“, rekao je gomili sučevih pristalica iz zapadne Virginije.

column3: The President obliquely referred to Kavanaugh's nomination while talking about the importance of Republican turnout in the midterm elections.
column4: Predsjednik se neizravno osvrnuo na Kavanaughovo imenovanje tijekom govora o važnosti odaziva republikanaca na srednjoročne izbore.

column3:
Five weeks away from one of the most important elections in our lifetimes.	„Još nas pet tjedana dijeli od jednih od najvažnijih izbora u našim životima.
cnn.304489	st10	I'm not running, but I'm really running, he said.
column4: Ne natječem se, ali se i stvarno natječem“, rekao je.

column3: That's why I'm all over the place fighting for great candidates.
column4: „Zato se kad i gdje god mogu otimam za sjajne kandidate.“

column3: Trump argued that Democrats are on a mission to "resist and obstruct."
column4: Trump je izjavio da demokrati nastoje „pružiti otpor i stvarati zapreke“.

column3: The first key procedural vote on the Senate floor on Kavanaugh's nomination is expected to take place no later than Friday, a senior GOP leadership aide has told CNN.
column4: Očekuje se da će se prvo ključno proceduralno glasovanje za Kavanaugha u Senatu održati najkasnije u petak, rekao je viši pomoćnik vodstva Republikanske stranke za CNN.

column3: Nestle tightens controls on coffee beans after weedkiller scare
column4: Nestlé postrožio inspekciju kave nakon panike oko herbicida

column3: The world's largest coffee company said in a statement Friday that it had found glyphosate residues close to the maximum allowed in some deliveries of green coffee beans.
column4: Najveća tvrtka za proizvodnju kave u svijetu je u petak izjavila da je u nekim isporukama zelene kave pronađena skoro maksimalna dozvoljena količina ostataka glifosata.

column3: Glyphosate is the key ingredient in Monsanto's weedkiller, Roundup. In the United States, juries have awarded huge monetary damages to people who say their cancer was caused by exposure to glyphosate. Bayer, which owns Monsanto, says the herbicide is safe when used properly, as does the US Environmental Protection Agency.
column4: Glifosat je glavni sastojak Roundupa, herbicida koji proizvodi Monsanto. U SAD-u su porote dodijelile ogromne odštete ljudima koji tvrde da im je izlaganje glifosatu uzrokovalo rak. Vlasnik Monsanta je Bayer iz kojeg tvrde da je herbicid siguran za korištenje uz ispravnu upotrebu, a s tom tvrdnjom se slaže i Američka agencija za zaštitu okoliša (Environmental Protection Agency, EPA).

column3: Neumann Kaffee Gruppe (NKG), one of the world's largest traders, said glyphosate was one of a number of substances it monitored on the coffee it buys. Nestle buys some of its coffee beans from NKG. It was too early to say what consequences Nestle's tighter controls would have on NKG, a spokesperson said.
column4: Iz tvrtke Neumann Kaffee Gruppe (NKG), jednog od vodećih svjetskih distributera kave, izjavili su da je glifosat na popisu tvari o kojima vode računa pri kupovanju kave. Nestlé (NSRGF) kupuje određenu količinu kave u zrnu od NKG-a. Poručili su da je prerano za donošenje zaključaka o tome kakve će posljedice Nestléove strože inspekcije imati na NKG.

column3: Nestle's (NSRGF) decision to increase the frequency of checks was unlikely to disrupt global coffee supply chains, a spokesperson said. "This is not a new process, we are just reinforcing controls," the spokesperson told CNN Business. Tests were done before the coffee was shipped from the countries of origin.
column4: Nadodali su kako nije vjerojatno da će Nestléova odluka o češćim provjerama poremetiti svjetske lance opskrbe kavom. „To nije novi proces, samo pojačavamo kontrole“, izjavili su za CNN Business. Provjere su se provodile prije nego što bi kava bila isporučena iz zemalja podrijetla.

column3: Nestle would start with suppliers in Indonesia and Brazil, since these countries are among the world's biggest coffee producers.
column4: Nestlé namjerava krenuti s dobavljačima iz Indonezije i Brazila, s obzirom na to da su te zemlje među najvećim proizvođačima kave u svijetu.

column3: Our agronomists will continue to work with coffee farmers to help them improve their weed management practices, including the appropriate use of herbicides and adoption of other weeding methods, the Swiss company said.
column4: „Naši će agronomi nastaviti surađivati s uzgajivačima kave kako bi im pomogli poboljšati praksu suzbijanja korova, što uključuje prikladan odabir herbicida i usvajanje drugih metoda za uklanjanje korova“, priopćili su iz švicarske tvrtke.

column3: Brands such as Nescafe and Nespresso make up a sizable chunk of Nestle's powdered and liquid beverages business, which generated sales of 21.6 billion Swiss francs ($21.7 billion) in 2018. Nestle last year agreed a deal to sell Starbucks' packaged coffees and teas around the world.
column4: Proizvodi kao što su Nescafe i Nespresso najprodavaniji su iz Nestléovog asortimana napitaka u prahu i tekućih napitaka te su im 2018. napravili promet od 21,6 milijardi švicarskih franaka (više od 136 milijardi kuna). Prošle je godine sklapanjem ugovora Nestlé plasirao kave i čajeve od Starbucksa na svjetsko tržište.

column3: Does glyphosate cause cancer?
column4: Uzrokuje li glifosat rak?

column3: Glyphosate is used on more than 100 food crops, according to the EPA. Scientists at an environmental advocacy group with links to the organic food industry say several popular breakfast cereals contain doses of the chemical that are higher than they consider safe for children.
column4: Glifosat se koristi na više od stotinu usjeva prema podacima od EPA-a. Znanstvenici iz interesne skupine za okoliš vezane uz industriju organske hrane tvrde da nekoliko popularnih brendova pahuljica sadržavaju prevelike količine glifosata koje nisu sigurne za djecu.

column3: Still, the EPA says glyphosate is not a carcinogen and that it poses no public health risks. Ecological risks include damage to pollinators and the problem of weed resistance, the EPA said in a statement in April.
column4: Ipak, EPA tvrdi da glifosat nije kancerogen i da ne predstavlja prijetnju javnom zdravlju. Prijetnje okolišu predstavljaju štete nanesene oprašivačima i problem otpornosti korova, izjavili su iz EPA-a u travnju.

column3: But that has not stopped thousands of people from filing lawsuits against Monsanto alleging that exposure to Roundup caused them or their loved ones to develop cancer.
column4: Međutim, to nije zaustavilo tisuće ljudi od podnošenja tužbi protiv Monsanta s optužbom da je njima ili nekome bliskom izloženost Roundupu uzrokovala rak.

column3: Earlier this year, a jury ordered Bayer to pay a California couple $2 billion in damages after they claimed that Roundup, used on their property for more than three decades, had given them both Non-Hodgkin lymphoma within four years of one other. Bayer is contesting the verdict.
column4: Ranije ove godine, jedna je porota odlučila da Bayer mora platiti 2 milijarde dolara paru iz Kalifornije koji je tvrdio da im je Roundup, koji su na imanju koristili više od trideset godina, uzrokovao ne-Hodgkinov limfom oboma unutar 4 godine razlike. Bayer se žali na presudu.

column3: A 2015 study by the World Health Organization's International Agency for Research on Cancer found that glyphosate was "probably carcinogenic to humans," based on "limited" evidence of cancer in humans and "sufficient" evidence of cancer in experimental animals. However, a joint panel of the WHO and the United Nations Food and Agriculture Organization later concluded that glyphosate is unlikely to pose a carcinogenic risk to humans from exposure through diet.
column4: Istraživanjem provedenim 2015. Međunarodna agencija za istraživanje raka Svjetske zdravstvene organizacije pokazala je da je glifosat „vjerojatno kancerogen za ljude“ na temelju „ograničenih“ dokaza raka kod ljudi i „dovoljnog“ dokaza raka kod eksperimentalnih životinja. Međutim, zajedničko povjerenstvo Svjetske zdravstvene organizacije i Organizacije za hranu i poljoprivredu Ujedinjenih naroda je kasnije zaključilo da nije vjerojatno da izloženost glifosatom kroz prehranu ljudima predstavlja kancerogeni rizik.

column3: Pet owners who fail to walk their dogs face $2,700 fine
column4: ﻿Vlasnicima kućnih ljubimaca koji ne šeću svoje pse prijeti novčana kazna od 2.700,00 australskih dolara

column3: Owners can face heavy on-the-spot fines if they fail to provide basics like shelter, food and water. People who confine dogs for 24 hours must also allow them to move freely for the next two hours or face prosecution.
column4: Vlasnici mogu na licu mjesta dobiti velike novčane kazne ukoliko ne osiguraju osnovne potrepštine poput skloništa, hrane i vode. Ljudi koji zatvaraju pse na 24 sata moraju im također dopustiti slobodno kretanje sljedeća dva sata, inače im prijeti kazneni progon.

column3: The territory is the first jurisdiction in Australia to recognize animal sentience.
column4: Ovaj teritorij prva je jurisdikcija u Australiji koja je priznala svijest životinja.

column3: Modern animal welfare is about considering how an animal is coping both mentally and physically with the conditions in which it lives, ACT City Service Minister Chris Steel, who secured the bill, said in a media release.
column4: „Moderna skrb za životinje podrazumijeva razmatranje o tome kako se životinja mentalno i fizički nosi s uvjetima u kojima živi“, ministar gradskih usluga ACT-a Chris Still, koji je osigurao provođenje zakona, rekao je u izjavi za medije.

column3: One in five children have secret social media accounts that they hide from their parents
column4: Svako peto dijete ima tajni račun na društvenim mrežama koji skriva od svojih roditelja

column3: One in five children - some as young as 11 - have secret social media accounts that they hide from their parents and teachers, survey reveals
column4: Istraživanjem se otkrilo da svako peto dijete - od kojih neka imaju samo 11 godina - ima tajni račun na društvenim mrežama koji skriva od svojih roditelja i učitelja.

column3: Survey of 20,000 secondary school pupils revealed growth in "fake Insta" pages
column4: U istraživanju u kojem je sudjelovalo 20 000 učenika srednjih škola pokazao se porast "lažnih Insta" profila

column3: The news has heightened fears that sexual content is being posted
column4: Ova vijest pojačala je strah da se objavljuje seksualni sadržaj

column3: Twenty per cent of pupils said they have a "main" account to show parents
column4: Dvadeset posto učenika reklo je da imaju "glavni" račun koji pokazuju roditeljima

column3: One in five children - some as young as 11 - are creating social media accounts that they keep secret from adults.
column4: Svako peto dijete - od kojih neka imaju samo 11 godina - stvara račun na društvenim mrežama koji taji od odraslih.

column3: A survey of 20,000 secondary school pupils revealed a rapid growth in "fake Insta" accounts - a reference to photo-sharing site Instagram.
column4: U istraživanju u kojem je sudjelovalo 20 000 učenika srednjih škola pokazao se brzi porast "lažnih Insta" profila - što se odnosi na Instagram, web-stranicu za dijeljenje fotografija.

column3: The news has heightened fears that sexual content is being posted.
column4: Ova vijest pojačala je strah da se objavljuje seksualni sadržaj.

column3: Twenty per cent of pupils said they operate a sanitised "main" account to show parents, while also having private ones.
column4: Dvadeset posto učenika reklo je da upravljaju očišćenim "glavnim" računom koji pokazuju roditeljima, no da također imaju privatne račune.

column3: One mother who stumbled across her 13-year-old's daughter's secret site found a teenager urging others to "rape me."
column4: Jedna je majka naišla na tajni profil svoje trinaestogodišnje kćeri gdje je otkrila da tinejdžerica ostale potiče: "Silujte me".

column3: The research, by Digital Awareness UK and the Headmasters" and Headmistresses" Conference (HMC) of independent schools, found 40 per cent of 11 to 18-year-olds had two profiles, with half of those admitting to keeping private accounts.
column4: U istraživanju agencije Digitalna osviještenost UK-a i udruge Konferencija ravnatelja i ravnateljica (KRR) neovisnih škola pokazalo se da 40% učenika u dobi od 11 do 18 godina ima dva profila, a pola ih je priznalo da imaju tajne račune.

column3: HMC chief Mike Buchanan said: "It's disturbing so many teenagers are tempted into creating online spaces where parents and teachers cannot find them."
column4: Načelnik KRR-a Mike Buchanan rekao je: "Uznemirujuće je što je toliko tinejdžera u iskušenju da stvore mrežne prostore gdje ih roditelji i učitelji ne mogu pronaći."

column3: New cancer vaccine can teach the immune system to 'see' rogue cells
column4: ﻿Novo cjepivo protiv raka može naučiti imunosni sustav da „vidi" zloćudne stanice

column3: New cancer vaccine can teach the immune system to 'see' rogue cells and kill them
column4: Novo cjepivo protiv raka može naučiti imunosni sustav da „vidi" zloćudne stanice i ubije ih

column3: Vaccine teaches immune system to recognise rogue cells as part of treatment
column4: Cjepivo uči imunosni sustav prepoznati zloćudne stanice u sklopu liječenja

column3: Method involves extracting immune cells from a patient, altering them in lab
column4: Metoda uključuje ekstrakciju imunih stanica iz pacijenta i njihovo mijenjanje u laboratoriju

column3: They can then 'see' a protein common to many cancers and then reinjected
column4: Tada one mogu „vidjeti" protein zajednički mnogim vrstama raka te ih se ponovno ubrizgava

column3: A trial vaccine is showing promising results in patients with a range of cancers.
column4: Probno cjepivo daje obećavajuće rezultate u pacijenata s raznim vrstama raka.

column3: One woman treated with the vaccine, which teaches the immune system to recognise rogue cells, saw her ovarian cancer disappear for more than 18 months.
column4: Kod jedne žene koja je primila cjepivo, koje uči imunosni sustav da prepozna zloćudne stanice, rak jajnika je nestao na više od 18 mjeseci.

column3: The method involves extracting immune cells from a patient, altering them in the laboratory so they can "see" a protein common to many cancers called HER2, and then reinjecting the cells.
column4: Ova metoda uključuje ekstrakciju imunih stanica iz pacijenata, njihovo mijenjanje u laboratoriju kako bi mogle „vidjeti" protein naziva HER2, zajednički mnogim vrstama raka, te zatim ponovno ubrizgavanje stanica.

column3: Professor Jay Berzofsky, of the US National Cancer Institute in Bethesda, Maryland, said: "Our results suggest that we have a very promising vaccine."
column4: Profesor Jay Berzofsky, s američkog Nacionalnog centra za rak u Bethesdi u državi Maryland, rekao je: „Naši rezultati upućuju na to da imamo jako obećavajuće cjepivo."

column3: HER2 "drives the growth of several types of cancer," including breast, ovarian, lung and colorectal cancers, Prof Berzofsky explained.
column4: HER2 „potiče razvoj nekoliko vrsti raka" uključujući rak dojke, rak jajnika, rak pluća te kolorektalni rak, objašnjava profesor Berzofsky.

column3: A similar approach of taking immune cells out of patients and "teaching" them how to target cancer cells has worked in treating a type of leukaemia.
column4: Sličan pristup vađenja imunih stanica iz pacijenata te "učenje" tih stanica kako da ciljaju na kancerogene stanice funkcionirao je u liječenju jedne vrste leukemije.

column3: Perfect time for a pint is 5.30pm on a Saturday, survey finds
column4: ﻿Savršeno vrijeme za čašu pive je subotom u 17:30, pokazalo je istraživanje

column3: The summer heatwave has boosted takings for Britain's struggling pubs but heaped more pressure on restaurant chains.
column4: Ljetni toplinski val povećao je zaradu britanskim pubovima u financijskim problemima, ali je stavio veći pritisak na lance restorana.

column3: Pub and bar groups saw sales rise 2.7 per cent in July - but takings in restaurants were down 4.8 per cent, figures revealed.
column4: Lanci pubova i kafića zabilježili su rast prodaje od 2,7 posto u srpnju, ali zarada u restoranima pala je za 4,8 posto, prema podacima.

column3: Peter Martin, of business consultancy CGA, which compiled the figures, said: "Continued sunshine and England's longer than expected participation in the World Cup meant July followed a similar pattern to the previous month of June, when pubs were up 2.8 per cent, except that restaurants were hit even harder.
column4: Peter Martin iz tvrtke za poslovno savjetovanje CGA koja je prikupila te podatke rekao je: „Nastavak sunčanih dana i sudjelovanje Engleske na Svjetskom prvenstvu koje traje dulje od očekivanog rezultiralo je podacima u srpnju sličnim onim iz prethodnog mjeseca lipnja, kada su pubovi bilježili rast od 2,8 posto, osim što su restorani bili još teže pogođeni.

column3: The fall of 1.8 per cent in restaurant trading in June just got worse in July.
column4: Pad od 1,8 posto u poslovanju restorana u lipnju samo se pogoršao u srpnju.

column3: Drink-led pubs and bars performed by far the strongest with like-for-likes up more than restaurants were down.
column4: Pubovi i kafići koji uglavnom prodaju pića poslovali su daleko najbolje te su bilježili rast veći od pada restorana.

column3: Food-led pubs also suffered in the sun, although not as dramatically as the restaurant operators.
column4: Pubovi koji uglavnom prodaju hranu također su bilježili pad u poslovanju zbog sunca, iako ne tako drastičan kao kod restorana.

column3: It seems people just wanted to go out for a drink.
column4: Čini se da ljudi samo žele izaći i popiti piće.

column3: Across managed pubs and bars drink sales were up 6.6 per cent for the month, with food down three per cent."
column4: Kod lanaca pubova i kafića prodaja pića narasla je za 6,6 posto za taj mjesec, a prodaja hrane pala je za tri posto.

column3: Paul Newman, of leisure and hospitality analysts RSM said: "These results continue the trend we've seen since the end of April.
column4: Paul Newman iz tvrtke za analizu slobodnog vremena i ugostiteljstva rekao je: „Ovi podaci potvrđuju trend koji je prisutan od kraja travnja.

column3: Weather and the impact of major social or sporting events remain the biggest factors when it comes to sales in the out-of-home market.
column4: Vremenski uvjeti i utjecaj velikih društvenih i sportskih događaja i dalje su jedni od najvećih čimbenika kada je u pitanju prodaja na tržištu izlazaka.

column3: It comes as no surprise that restaurant groups continue to struggle, albeit a sales drop of 4.8 per cent year-on-year will be particularly painful on top of ongoing cost pressures.
column4: Nije iznenađujuće što lanci restorana i dalje slabije posluju, premda će pad u prodaji od 4,8 posto svake godine biti posebno težak povrh kontinuiranog pritiska troškova.

column3: The long hot summer could not have come at a worse time for food-led operators and time will tell whether the more moderate temperatures we've experienced in August will provide some much-needed respite."
column4: Dugo toplo ljeto nije moglo doći u gore vrijeme za voditelje lokala koji prodaju hranu i vrijeme će pokazati hoće li blaže temperature koje smo doživjeli u kolovozu pružiti prijeko potreban predah.“

column3: Total sales growth across pub and restaurants, including new openings, was 2.7 per cent in July, reflecting the slow down in brand roll-outs.
column4: Ukupan rast prodaje kod pubova i restorana, uključujući one novootvorene, iznosio je 2,7 posto u srpnju, sukladno usporavanju otvaranja novih lanaca.

column3: The Coffer Peach Tracker industry sales monitor for the UK pub, bar and restaurant sector collects and analyses performance data from 47 operating groups, with a combined turnover of over £9 billion, and is the established industry benchmark.
column4: Coffer Peach sustav praćenja prodaje u industriji za sektor pubova, kafića i restorana u UK-u prikuplja i analizira podatke o uspješnosti od 47 aktivnih lanaca, sa zajedničkim prometom od 9 milijardi funti te je utemeljen kao mjerilo u toj industriji.

column3: PM Modi Tweets Tribute To Jacques Chirac, Calls Him True Global Statesman, Friend Of India
column4: ﻿Premijer Modi na Twitteru odao počast Jacquesu Chiracu, nazvao ga istinskim svjetskim političkim vođom, prijateljem Indije

column3: Prime Minister Narendra Modi condoled the death of former French president Jacques Chirac, saying India mourns the loss of a true global statesman and friend.
column4: Premijer Narendra Modi sažalijevao je smrt bivšeg francuskog predsjednika Jacquesa Chiraca,  govoreći kako Indija tuguje zbog gubitka istinskog svjetskog političkog vođe i prijatelja.

column3: Jacques Chirac, who supported India after it conducted nuclear tests in 1998, died on Thursday at age 86. He served as the president of France from 1995 to 2007.
column4: Jacques Chirac, koji je podržavao Indiju nakon što je provela nuklearne pokuse 1998., umro je u četvrtak u 86. godini života. Bio je predsjednik Francuske od 1995. do 2007.

column3: My deepest condolences on passing away of Jacques Chirac. India mourns the loss of a true global statesman. A friend of India, he played a decisive role in establishing and building India-France Strategic Partnership, Prime Minister Modi tweeted.
column4: „Moja najiskrenija sućut zbog smrti Jacquesa Chiraca. Indija tuguje zbog gubitka istinskog svjetskog političkog vođe. Kao prijatelj Indije, imao je ključnu ulogu u osnivanju i stvaranju strateškog partnerstva između Indije i Francuske“, premijer Modi objavio je na Twitteru.

column3: India and France have a strategic partnership, initiated in January 1998 during Jacques Chirac's first visit to India. He again visited the country as president in 2006.
column4: Indija i Francuska imaju strateško partnerstvo, pokrenuto u siječnju 1998. tijekom prvog posjeta Jacquesa Chiraca Indiji. Ponovno je posjetio Indiju kao predsjednik 2006.

column3: Jacques Chirac was known to have been suffering from ill health for a long time.
column4: Za Jacquesa Chiraca se znalo da je bio lošeg zdravlja duže vrijeme.

column3: Indonesia earthquake tsunami: hundreds killed
column4: Tsunami izazvan potresom u Indoneziji: stotine mrtvih

column3: At least 384 people have died after an earthquake hit the Indonesian island of Sulawesi on Friday.
column4: Najmanje 384 ljudi poginulo je nakon što je potres pogodio indonezijski otok Sulawesi u petak.

column3: The 7.5-magnitude earthquake triggered a tsunami and has destroyed thousands of homes.
column4: Potres jačine 7,5 izazvao je tsunami koji je uništio tisuće domova.

column3: Electricity and communication networks are down with death tolls expected to rise in coming days.
column4: Elektroenergetske i komunikacijske mreže nisu u funkciji, a očekuje se da će se u narednim danima broj smrtnih slučajeva povećati.

column3: The earthquake hit just off central Sulawesi which is northeast of the Indonesian capital, Jakarta.
column4: Epicentar potresa bio je u središnjem Sulawesiju, sjeveroistočno od indonezijskog glavnog grada Jakarte.

column3: Videos are circulating on social media showing the moment of impact.
column4: Društvenim mrežama kruže videozapisi trenutka udara potresa.

column3: Hundreds of people had gathered for a beach festival in the city of Palu when the tsunami smashed on shore.
column4: Stotine ljudi bilo je okupljeno na festivalu na plaži u gradu Paluu kad je tsunami udario u obalu.

column3: Syria 'ready' for refugees to return, says Foreign Minister
column4: ﻿Sirija „spremna“ za povratak izbjeglica, tvrdi Ministar vanjskih poslova

column3: Syria says it's ready for the voluntary return of refugees and is appealing for help to rebuild the country devastated by a more than seven-year long war.
column4: Sirija je navodno spremna za dobrovoljni povratak izbjeglica, stoga se apelira na obnovu zemlje koja je zadnjih sedam godina devastirana ratom.

column3: Speaking to the United Nations General Assembly, Foreign minister Walid al-Moualem said conditions in the country are improving.
column4: U razgovoru s Općom skupštinom Ujedinjenih naroda sirijski Ministar vanjskih poslova rekao je da se okolnosti u zemlji poboljšavaju.

column3: Today the situation on the ground is more stable and secure thanks to progress made in combating terrorism, he said.
column4: „Danas je situacija stabilnija i sigurnija zahvaljujući ostvarenom napretku u borbi protiv terorizma“, izjavio je ministar.

column3: The government continues to rehabilitate the areas destroyed by terrorists to restore normalcy.
column4: Vlada nastavlja obnovu područja koja su napali teroristi kako bi se situaciju vratila čim bliže normali.

column3: All conditions are now present for the voluntary return of refugees to the country they had to leave because of terrorism and the unilateral economic measures that targeted their daily lives and their livelihoods.
column4: Okolnosti su sad pogodne za dobrovoljni povratak izbjeglica u zemlju koju su bili prisiljeni napustiti uslijed terorističkih napada i jednostranih gospodarskih mjera koje su pogodile njihove živote i izvore zarade.

column3: The UN estimates that more than 5.5 million Syrians have fled the country since the war began in 2011.
column4: UN procjenjuje da je Siriju napustilo više od 5,5 milijuna Sirijaca od 2011. godine kad je rat počeo.

column3: Another six million people still living in the country are in need of humanitarian assistance.
column4: Preostalih šest milijuna ljudi koji još uvek žive u zemlji treba humanitarnu pomoć.

column3: Al-Moualem said the Syrian regime would welcome help in rebuilding the devastated country.
column4: Al-Moulaem rekao je da bi  sukladno sirijskom režimu svaka pomoć pomoć za obnovu devastirane zemlje bila dobrodošla.

column3: But he stressed that it would not accept conditional assistance or help from countries that sponsored the insurgency.
column4: No naglasio je i da se neće prihvatiti uvjetovana pomoć od zemalja koje su podržale pobunu.

column3: Erdogan get mixed reception in Cologne
column4: Oprečne reakcije na Erdogana u K ö lnu

column3: There were smiles and blue skies on Saturday (September 29) as the leaders of Turkey and Germany met for breakast in Berlin.
column4: U subotu (29. rujna) za vrijeme radnog doručka na kojem su se u Berlinu susreli lideri Njemačke i Turske bilo je osmijeha i plavog neba.

column3: It's the last day of President Erdogan's controversial visit to Germany - which is aimed at repairing relations beteen the NATO allies.
column4: Bio je to posljednji dan kontroverznog Erdoganova posjeta Njemačkoj u svrhu popravljanja odnosa između dvaju NATO saveznika.

column3: They've fallen out over issues including human rights, press freedom and Turkey's accession to the EU.
column4: Dvije su se zemlje u prošlosti sporile oko problema kao što su ljudska prava, sloboda medija i ulazak Turske u EU.

column3: Erdogan then headed for Cologne to open a giant new mosque.
column4: Erdogan je poslije doručka otišao u K öln , gdje je otvorio divovsku novu džamiju.

column3: The city is home to the largest Turkish population outside Turkey.
column4: U tome gradu živi najveći broj Turaka izvan Turske.

column3: Police cited security reasons to block a 25,000-strong crowd from gathering in front of the mosque, but plenty of supporters turned out nearby to see their president.
column4: Policija je iz sigurnosnih razloga spriječila okupljanje gomile od 25 000 ljudi ispred džamije, no mnogi su Erdoganovi pristaše došli vidjeti svog predsjednika.

column3: Hundreds of anti-Erdogan protesters - many of them Kurdish - also made their voices heard, condemning both Erdogan's policies and the German government's decision to welcome him to the country.
column4: Stotine prosvjednika protiv Erdogana , od kojih su mnogi bili Kurdi, također su izrazili svoje stavove tako što su osudili Erdoganovu politiku te odluku njemačke vlade da mu poželi dobrodošlicu u Njemačku.

column3: The dueling protests reflect the divisiveness of a visitor hailed as a hero by some German Turks and reviled as an autocrat by others.
column4: Dva oprečna prosvjeda pokazuju da gost, kojeg neki njemački Turci slave kao heroja, a drugi preziru kao autokrata, izaziva brojne kontroverze.

column3: Death toll from Indonesia tsunami rises to 832
column4: Broj mrtvih zbog tsunamija u Indoneziji popeo se na 832.

column3: The death toll in Indonesia's earthquake and tsunami has climbed to 832, the country's disaster agency said early Sunday.
column4: Broj mrtvih uslijed potresa i tsunamija u Indoneziji popeo se na 832, izjavila je državna agencija za katastrofe u nedjelju ujutro.

column3: Many people were reported trapped in the rubble of buildings brought down in the 7.5 magnitude earthquake which struck Friday and triggered waves as high as 20 feet, agency spokesman Sutopo Purwo Nugroho told a news conference.
column4: Mnogi su ostali zatočeni ispod ruševina zgrada srušenih tijekom potresa magnitude 7.5 koji je udario u petak i izazvao valove visine do šest metara, glasnogovornik agencije Purwo Nugroho rekao je na konferenciji za novinare.

column3: The city of Palu, which has more than 380,000 people, was strewn with debris from collapsed buildings.
column4: Grad Palu, u kojemu živi više od 380 000 stanovnika, prekriven je ruševinama zgrada.

column3: Pompeo accuses Syria of using chemical weapons in May attack
column4: Pompeo optužio Siriju za uporabu kemijskog oružja u napadu u svibnju

column3: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo, speaking on the sidelines of the U.N. General Assembly on Thursday, said the United States has concluded the Syrian government used chemical weapons in an attack earlier this year.
column4: Državni tajnik Mike Pompeo rekao je u svom govoru na nezavisnom sastanku svjetskih čelnika Opće skupštine UN-a da je SAD u svojoj istrazi zaključio da je sirijska vlada koristila kemijsko oružje u napadu ranije ove godine.

column3: Pompeo said U.S. officials had determined Syrian President Bashar Assad's government had used chlorine in the attack on opposition forces in Idlib province on May 19.
column4: Pompeo je rekao da su američki službenici utvrdili da je vlada sirijskog predsjednika Bashara Assada koristila kloh u napadima na opozicijske snage u pokrajini Idlib 19. svibnja.

column3: The Assad regime is responsible for innumerable atrocities some of which rise to the level of war crimes and crimes against humanity, Pompeo told a news conference.
column4: Assadov režim odgovoran je za nebrojne zločine, neki od kojih su na razini ratnih zločina i zločina protiv čovječnosti, rekao je Pompeo na konferenciji za novinare.

column3: U.S. officials in May said they'd received reports consistent with a chemical attack in northwest Syria but did not offer a definitive conclusion at the time.
column4: Američki službenici rekli su u svibnju da su zaprimili izvještaje koji odgovaraju kemijskom napadu na sjeverozapadu Sirije, ali tada nisu došli do konačnog zaključka.

column3: In April 2018, the U.S., Britain and France launched airstrikes in Syria in retaliation for what they described as a suspected chemical attack that killed more than 40 people earlier that month.
column4: U travnju 2018. SAD, Britanija i Francuska naredile su zračne napade u Siriji kao odmazdu za navodne kemijske napade koji su ubili više od 40 ljudi ranije tog mjeseca.

column3: This is different in some sense because it was chlorine... but know that President Trump has been pretty vigorous in protecting the world from the use of chemical weapons, Pompeo said.
column4: Ovo je na neki način drugačije jer je riječ o kloru... no budite svjesni da je predsjednik Trump ustrajan u zaštiti svijeta od uporabe kemijskog oružja, rekao je Pompeo.

column3: He added that the U.S. would provide an additional $4.5 million to the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons to fund investigations into other instances of suspected Syrian chemical-weapons use.
column4: Nadodao je da će SAD dati dodatnih 4,5 milijuna dolara Organizaciji za zabranu kemijskog oružja kako bi financirali istrage drugih slučajeva moguće uporabe sirijskog kemijskog oružja.

column3: Pompeo also called on the Assad government to release thousands of unjustly detained prisoners, including American journalist Austin Tice, who has been missing and presumed held by the government for seven years.
column4: Pompeo je također pozvao Assadovu vladu da oslobodi tisuće nepravedno zatočenih zatvorenika, uključujući i američkog novinara Austina Ticea, koji je proglašen nestalim prije sedam godina i za kojeg se vjeruje da ga je zatočila Assadova vlada.

column3: He is just one of a number of American citizens held in Syria and we call upon the Syrian regime to release them all.
column4: On je samo jedan od brojnih američkih državljana koji su zatočeni u Siriji i pozivamo sirijsku vladu da ih sve oslobodi.

column3: Matt de Grood shouldn't be punished because of schizophrenia stigma
column4: Matt de Grood ne bi trebao biti kažnjen zbog stigmatizacije shizofrenije

column3: In 2016, Matthew de Grood, the man who killed five people at a house party in Calgary, was found to be not criminally responsible for his actions.
column4: 2016. godine je Matthew de Grood, čovjek koji je ubio petero ljudi na kućnoj zabavi u Calgaryju, proglašen nevinim i da nije kazneno odgovoran za svoje postupke.

column3: Now, in 2019, there is a hearing to determine whether or not he should be allowed more freedoms, such as unsupervised outings. The decision won't come for a few more weeks, so in the meantime we're left to wonder whether or not this is a good idea. There are two sides to this: one citing his violent behaviour in the past, calling to prevent it from happening again, and the other side which believes in the power of change and rehabilitation.
column4: A sad, u 2019. godini, održat će se saslušanje kako bi se utvrdilo treba li mu se dozvoliti veća razina sloboe, poput izlazaka bez nadzora. Odluka se neće donijeti još nekoliko tjedana, a u međuvremenu se mi moramo pitati je li ovo dobra ideja. Postoje dvije opcije: možemo istaknuti njegovo nasilno ponašanje u prošlosti kako bi se spriječilo da se isto ikad ponovi, ili pak možemo vjerovati u moć promjene i rehabilitacije.

column3: First, let's examine the more pessimistic side. De Grood did stab and kill five people during a psychotic break. It was a violent and unpredictable attack. He suffers from schizophrenia, which is why he was found not criminally responsible, but has since been seeing a psychiatrist and taking his medication. His psychiatrist, Dr. Santoch Rai, has said in front of the review board that "if Matthew de Grood were to commit another offence, it would be severe." Despite his perceived improvement, there is still risk of re-offense. But is this reason enough to remain afraid? Is it enough to keep de Grood locked up?
column4: Kao prvo, proanalizirajmo onu pesimističnu stranu. De Grood je izbo i ubio petero ljudi tijekom psihotične epizode. Bio je to nasilan i nepredvidiv napad. De Grood pati od shizofrenije, zbog koje i nije proglašen krivim, ali je u međuvremenu počeo ići psihijatru i piti lijekove. Njegov je psihijatar Dr. Santoch Rai pred odborom koji odlučuje o uvjetnom otpuštanju rekao da "ako Matthew de Grood ponovno počini kazneno djelo, ono će biti ozbiljno". Iako se čini kako mu se stanje pobolljšalo, postoji šansa od ponovnog počinjenja kaznenog djela. No je li to dovoljan razlog da se i dalje bojimo? Je li to dovoljno da de Grood ostane iza rešetaka?

column3: As long as de Grood continues to take his medication, there isn't a huge risk of reoffense, so why are people so concerned? I believe the stigma surrounding people with mental illness, particularly those with schizophrenia, largely influences this fear. Certain mental illnesses have become less stigmatized, such as mood and anxiety disorders. But others, including schizophrenia, remain highly stigmatized. This is in large part due to numerous portrayals of schizophrenics as dangerous people with voices in their heads telling them to kill people.
column4: Dok god de Grood nastavi piti lijekove, rizik od ponovnog počinjenja nije velik, zašto su onda ljudi toliko zabrinuti? Vjerujem da je stigma koja okružuje duševno bolesne ljude, posebnice one koji pate od shizofrenije, uzrok tog straha. Određene duševne bolesti nisu toliko stigmatizirane, poput anksioznih poremećaja i poremećaja raspoloženja. A neke druge bolesti, uključujući i shizofreniju, i dalje su izrazito stigmatizirane. Velikim je dijelom to iz razloga što se shizofreničare često prikazuje kao opasne ljude kojima glasovi u glavi govore da ubijaju ljude.

column3: That was the case in this situation, but these instances are rare, and that's perhaps why we remember them so well when they occur. In fact, the majority of schizophrenic individuals are nonviolent, and are more likely to be the victims rather than the perpetrators of crime or violence. In light of this, it seems unreasonable to insist that de Grood be denied certain freedoms when the fear of re-offense is based more on a prejudiced attitude towards people with schizophrenia than actual likelihood.
column4: To je bio slučaj u ovoj situaciji, ali takvi su primjeri rijetki, a valjda ih zato toliko dobro pamtimo kada se dogode. Štoviše, većina shizofreničara nije nasilna., i čak su češće žrtve nego počinitelji nekog kaznenog djela ili nasilja. U svjetlu toga, čini se nerazumno inzistirati da se de Groodu ne dopuste određene slobode kad se strah od ponovnog počinjenja temelji na predrasudama prema shizofreničarima, a ne na stvarnoj vjerojatnosti.

column3: I don't believe de Grood should ever be unsupervised permanently. A parole-like system where he has to check in to make sure he's still taking his medication could work well. Arguing that he or other mentally ill people remain institutionalized unless absolutely necessary is a form of segregation. It perpetuates the idea that mentally ill people, those with schizophrenia in particular, cannot ever mesh with society; thus continuing the stigma and perpetuating the idea that they are dangerous criminals. He was found not criminally responsible by a court of law, so why should he be treated like a prisoner instead of someone who was ill and is now better?
column4: Ne vjerujem da se de Grooda uopće ne treba promatrati. Dobro bi funkcionirao sustav sličan uvjetnom otpustu, gdje se on mora nekome javljati da bi dokazao da i dalje pije lijekove. Govoriti da bi on ili drugi ljudi s duševnim bolestima trebali ostati institucionalizirani osim ako puštanje na slobodu nije izričito nužno je vrsta segregacije i promiče ideju da se duševni bolesnici, a posebice shizofreničari, ne mogu uklopiti u društvo, a time se dalje promiče stigmatizacije i ideja da su oni opasni kriminalci. Sud je rekao da on nije kazneno odgovoran, pa zašto bi trebao biti tretiran kao zatvorenik, a ne kao osoba koja je bila bolesna, a sada je bolje?

column3: Russian Grand Prix: Lewis Hamilton closes in on world title after team orders hand him win over Sebastian Vettel
column4: Ruski Grand Prix: Lewis Hamilton bliži se tituli svjetskog prvaka nakon što su mu timske naredbe omogućile pobjedu nad Sebastianom Vettelom

column3: It became clear from the moment that Valtteri Bottas qualified ahead of Lewis Hamilton on Saturday that Mercedes" team orders would play a large part in the race.
column4: Čim se Valtteri Bottas u subotu kvalificirao ispred Lewisa Hamiltona, postalo je jasno da će naredbe Mercedesova tima odigrati veliku ulogu u utrci.

column3: From pole, Bottas got a good start and almost hung Hamilton out to dry as he defended his position in the first two turns and invited Vettel to attack his teammate.
column4: Bottas je imao dobar početak iz pol pozicije i gotovo da je ostavio Hamiltona na cjedilu dok je branio svoju poziciju u prva dva zavoja i pozvao Vettela da napadne njegova suigrača.

column3: Vettel went into the pits first and left Hamilton to run into the traffic at the tail of the pack, something which should have been decisive.
column4: Vettel je otišao u boks prvi i ostavio Hamiltona da upadne u gužvu na kraju grupe, nešto što je trebalo biti presudno.

column3: The Mercedes pitted a lap later and came out behind Vettel, but Hamilton went ahead after some wheel-to-wheel action that saw the Ferrari driver reluctantly leave the inside free at risk of holding out after a double-move to defend on the third corner.
column4: Mercedes je idući krug ušao u boks te izišao iza Vettela, ali Hamilton ga je prestigao nakon vožnje rame uz rame u kojoj je vozač Ferrarija nerado napustio unutrašnju stranu s rizikom da neće izdržati dvostruki potez radi obrane pozicije na trećem zavoju.

column3: Max Verstappen started from the back row of the grid and was in seventh by the end of the first lap on his 21st birthday.
column4: Max Verstappen krenuo je sa stražnjeg reda startne rešetke i završio na sedmome mjestu na kraju prvog kruga na svoj 21. rođendan.

column3: He then led for a large part of the race as he held onto his tyres to target a quick finish and overtake Kimi Raikkonen for fourth.
column4: Zatim je vodio većim dijelom utrke te je ubrzao kako bi što prije došao do cilja i pretekao Kimija Raikkonena za četvrto mjesto.

column3: He eventually came into the pits on the 44th lap but was unable to increase his pace in the remaining eight laps as Raikkonen took fourth.
column4: U konačnici je ušao u boks u 44. krugu, ali nije mogao povećati svoju brzinu u preostalih osam krugova dok je Raikkonen zauzeo četvrto mjesto.

column3: It's a difficult day because Valtteri did a fantastic job all weekend and was a real gentleman told let me by.
column4: Ovo je težak dan zato što je Valtteri odradio odličan posao cijeli vikend i bio pravi gospodin.

column3: The team have done such an exceptional job to have a one two," said Hamilton.
column4:
Tim je odradio izuzetno dobar posao kako bi uzeo prvo i drugo mjesto”, izjavio je Hamilton.

kcal.279	st04	I wish I could trade places with you son, I wish I could trade places with you," Guy Alford, the victim's father, said.
column5: Kad bi samo mogao biti na tvom mjestu, sine, kad bi samo mogao biti na tvom mjestu, rekao je Guy Alford, žrtvin otac.

column3: Alford came back to the scene of the crime exactly one year after his son, Guy Alford III, was gunned down at a Jack In The Box near 52nd and Atlantic. He said he wanted to call attention to his son's unsolved murder.
column4: Alford se vratio na mjesto zločina točno godinu dana nakon što je njegov sin, Guy Alford III, upucan u restoranu brze hrane na križanju 52. ulice i avenije Atlantic. Rekao je da želi skrenuti pozornost na neriješeno ubojstvo svoga sina.

column3: Somebody knows something, they need to say something, he said.
column4: Ako netko nešto zna, mora to reći, rekao je.

column3: Security video, which has never been released, showed Alford stopped in the drive-thru when a second car pulled up behind him. Three suspects were then seen getting out of that car. One of them walked up to the driver's side, and shot Alford. The four people in Alford's car jumped out and ran. The suspects were then seen getting back into their car and driving away.
column4: Snimka nadzornih kamera, koja nikad nije objavljena, pokazuje da je Alford stajao u drive-thru prolazu kad je drugi automobil stao iza njega. Tri osumnjičenika su zatim izašla iz automobila. Jedan od njih došao je do vozačeve strane i upucao Alforda. Četvero ljudi u Alfordovom automobilu istrčali su iz auta i pobjegli. Osumnjičenici su se zatim vratili u automobil i odvezli dalje.

column3: Wherever this coward is, he will get caught, Alford said.
column4: Gdje god da se nalazi ta kukavica, bit će uhvaćen, rekao je Alford.

column3: This grieving father said he has no idea who would want to hurt his son, and he said he still didn't know who was in the car with him when he was shot.
column4: Tugujući otac rekao je da nema pojma tko bi želio nauditi njegovom sinu, kao i da još uvijek ne zna tko je bio s njim u automobilu kad je upucan.

column3: They upped and ran out of my son's car like that, where did you run to, Alford said. "Did you go back and try to help him or what? Nobody said nothing."
column4: Iznenada su samo tako istrčali iz sinovog automobila, gdje ste pobjegli, rekao je Alford. "Jeste li se vratili i pokušali mu pomoći ili što već? Nitko ništa nije rekao".

column3: Alford said his son was a star football player at Alemany High School, then a stand-out safety on the Long Beach City College football team. Alford said his son was working toward playing for a Division 1 school and had dreams of becoming a nurse.
column4: Alford kaže da je njegov sin bio najbolji igrač američkog nogometa srednje škole Alemany, a zatim istaknuti safety u momčadi Long Beach City Collegea. Alford kaže da je njegov sin bio na putu da zaigra za školu koja se natječe u prvoj diviziji te da je sanjao da će postati medicinski tehničar.

column3: He was working three jobs, Michael Harvey, a friend, said. "As somebody who's 21, he was a year younger than me, anybody with that type of hustle and work ethic, you tend to look up to."
column4: Imao je tri posla, rekao je njegov prijatelj Michael Harvey. "Kao 21-godišnjak, bio je godinu mlađi od mene, ugledaš se na bilo koga tko je tako marljiv i ima takvu radnu etiku".

column3: As the investigation into the fatal shooting continues, Alford said he wasn't giving up either.
column4: Dok se nastavlja istraga ove smrtonosne pucnjave, Alford kaže da ni on ne odustaje.

column3: I can assure you, this one is going to get solved, he said.
column4: Uvjeravam vas, ovo će se riješiti, rekao je.

column3: Alford is personally offering a $2,000 reward for information that leads to an arrest and conviction. Anyone with information about this crime is urged to call Long Beach police.
column4: Alford osobno nudi nagradu od 2000 funti za informacije koje bi dovele do uhićenja i presude. Upućuju se svi koji imaju informacije o ovom zločinu da se jave policiji u Long Beachu.

column3: U.S. Weighed Penalizing El Salvador Over Support for China, Then Backed Off
column4: SAD razmišljao o kažnjavanju El Salvadora zbog potpore Kini, a onda odustao

column3: Diplomats noted that the Dominican Republic and Panama had already recognized Beijing, with little pushback from Washington.
column4: Diplomati su primjetili da su Dominikanska Republika i Panama već priznale Beijing, s negodovanjem iz Washingtona.

column3: Mr. Trump had a warm meeting with President Juan Carlos Varela of Panama in June 2017 and had a hotel in Panama until partners evicted the Trump Organization's management team.
column4: Trump je imao ugodan sastanak s panamskim predsjednikom Juanom Carlosom Varelom u lipnju 2017., a imao je i hotel u Panami sve dok partneri nisu izbacili Trumpov upravljački tim.

column3: State Department officials decided to call back the American chiefs of diplomatic missions from El Salvador, the Dominican Republic and Panama over the "recent decisions to no longer recognize Taiwan," Heather Nauert, the department's spokeswoman, said in a statement early this month.
column4: Dužnosnici Ministarstva vanjskih poslova odlučili su pozvati američke šefove diplomatskih misija iz El Salvadora, Dominikanske Republike i Paname zbog "nedavnih odluka da se Tajvan više ne prizna", izjavila je početkom ovog mjeseca Heather Nauert, glasnogovornica ministarstva.

column3: But penalties were only considered against El Salvador, which received an estimated $140 million in American aid in 2017, including for narcotics controls, development and economic support.
column4: Međutim, razmišljalo se samo o kažnjavanju El Salvadora, koji je 2017. primio oko 140 milijuna dolara pomoći iz SAD-a, uključujući za kontrolu narkotika, razvoj i ekonomsku potporu.

column3: The proposed penalties, which included cuts to financial aid and targeted visa restrictions, would have been painful for the Central American country and its high unemployment and murder rates.
column4: Predložene kazne, koje su uključivale smanjenje financijske pomoći i ograničenja vezana uz vize, bile bi bolne za ovu zemlju Srednje Amerike i njezinu visoku stopu nezaposlenosti i ubojstava.

column3: As internal meetings progressed, North American and Central American officials postponed a high-level conference focused on security and economic prosperity to follow up a similar gathering last year that was seen as a step forward in efforts to prevent migrants from heading to the United States.
column4: Kako su unutarnji sastanci napredovali, sjevernoamerički i srednjoamerički dužnosnici odgodili su konferenciju na visokoj razini na kojoj bi se usredotočili na sigurnost i gospodarski prosperitet, nastavno na slično okupljanje od prošle godine koje se smatralo korakom naprijed u naporima da se spriječi dolazak migranata u SAD.

column3: But by mid-September, top administration officials made clear that they wanted the conference to go forward, effectively ending any consideration of penalties for El Salvador.
column4: Međutim, do sredine rujna najviši dužnosnici administracije jasno su dali do znanja kako žele da se konferencija nastavi, čime bi se učinkovito okončalo svako razmatranje kazni za El Salvador.

column3: Vice President Mike Pence is now slated to address the conference, now scheduled for mid-October, in a signal of the import the administration places on the gathering, the diplomats said.
column4: Potpredsjednik Mike Pence sada bi se trebao obratiti konferenciji, koja je zakazana za sredinu listopada, kao znak važnosti koji administracija stavlja na skup, kazali su diplomati.

column3: And the three American envoys quietly returned to El Salvador, Panama and the Dominican Republic with no new tough messages or punishments from Washington.
column4: I tri američka izaslanika mirno su se vratila u El Salvador, Panamu i Dominikansku Republiku bez novih ozbiljnih poruka ili kazni iz Washingtona.

column3: A White House spokesman for Mr. Bolton declined to comment on the details of the debate that were described by the three American officials, including two diplomats, who agreed to discuss the internal deliberations on the condition of anonymity.
column4: Glasnogovornik g. Boltona iz Bijele kuće odbio je komentirati detalje rasprave koje su otkrili trojica američkih dužnosnika, uključujući dvojicu diplomata, a koji su pristali razgovarati o unutarnjim promišljanjima pod uvjetom da ostanu anonimni.

column3: Their accounts were corroborated by an outside analyst who is close to the administration and also spoke on the condition of anonymity.
column4: Njihove priče potvrdio je vanjski analitičar blizak administraciji, koji je također je progovorio pod uvjetom da ostane anoniman.

column3: Hundreds of Migrant Children Quietly Moved to a Tent Camp on the Texas Border
column4: Stotine djece migranata potiho premješteno u šatorski kamp na granici s Teksasom

column3: The number of detained migrant children has spiked even though monthly border crossings have remained relatively unchanged, in part because harsh rhetoric and policies introduced by the Trump administration have made it harder to place children with sponsors.
column4: Broj zadržane djece migranata je porastao iako je broj mjesečnih prelazaka preko granice ostao gotovo nepromijenjen, djelomice zbog oštrih riječi i politike koju je vodila Trumpova vlada, što je rezultiralo težim pronalaskom ljudi koji bi se brinuli za tu djecu.

column3: Traditionally, most sponsors have been undocumented immigrants themselves, and have feared jeopardizing their own ability to remain in the country by stepping forward to claim a child.
column4: U pravilu, većina takozvanih "sponzora" su i sami imigranti bez dokumenata i boje se da će ugroziti svoj ostanak u zemlji ako istupe i požele se brinuti za jedno od djece.

column3: The risk increased in June, when federal authorities announced that potential sponsors and other adult members of their households would have to submit fingerprints, and that the data would be shared with immigration authorities.
column4: Taj se rizik povećao u lipnju kad su državne vlasti najavile da će potencijalni sponzori i druge odrasle osobe iz istog kućanstva morati dati svoje otiske prstiju te da će ti podaci biti dostupni službama za migraciju.

column3: Last week, Matthew Albence, a senior official with Immigration and Customs Enforcement, testified before Congress that the agency had arrested dozens of people who applied to sponsor unaccompanied minors.
column4: Prošli je tjedan visoki dužnosnik Imigracije i carina Matthew Albence svjedočio pred Kongresom i izjavio da je agencija uhitila desetke ljudi koji su se prijavili za zbrinjavanje maloljetnika bez pratnje.

column3: The agency later confirmed that 70 percent of those arrested did not have prior criminal records.
column4: Agencija je kasnije potvrdila da 70 % uhićenih nemaju prethodno počinjenih kaznenih djela.

column3:
Close to 80 percent of the individuals that are either sponsors or household members of sponsors are here in the country illegally, and a large chunk of those are criminal aliens.	„Gotovo 80 posto osoba koje su prethodno bili sponzori ili ukućani sponzora su ilegalno u državi, a veliki dio čine odbjegli kriminalci.
nytimes.184862	st06	So we are continuing to pursue those individuals, Mr. Albence said.
column4: Dakle, mi nastavljamo progoniti te osobe", rekao je Albence.

column3: Seeking to process the children more quickly, officials introduced new rules that will require some of them to appear in court within a month of being detained, rather than after 60 days, which was the previous standard, according to shelter workers.
column4: Radnici u skloništu kažu da su u svrhu što bržeg zbrinjavanja djece službenici uveli nova pravila koja zahtijevaju da se neki od potencijalnih sponzora pojave pred sudom unutar mjesec dana od datuma pritvora, a ne unutar uobičajenih 60 dana.

column3: Many will appear via video conference call, rather than in person, to plead their case for legal status to an immigration judge.
column4: Mnogi će od njih prisustvovati saslušanju putem videokonferencijskog poziva kako bi iznijeli svoj slučaj i borili se za legalni status u državi pred sudcem za migracije.

column3: Those who are deemed ineligible for relief will be swiftly deported.
column4: Oni koji se smatraju nepodobnim za ostanak ubrzo će biti deportirani.

column3: The longer that children remain in custody, the more likely they are to become anxious or depressed, which can lead to violent outbursts or escape attempts, according to shelter workers and reports that have emerged from the system in recent months.
column4: Što duže djeca ostaju u pritvoru, veće su šanse da postanu nervozna i depresivna, što može dovesti do nasilja ili pokušaja bijega, kažu radnici u skloništu, a isto to potvrđuju i izvješća o prošlom mjesecu iz samog sustava.

column3: Advocates said those concerns are heightened at a larger facility like Tornillo, where signs that a child is struggling are more likely to be overlooked, because of its size.
column4: Odvjetnici kažu da se ti rizici povećavaju u većim skloništima poput Tornilla, gdje su zbog veličine skloništa veće šanse da nitko ne primijeti dijete koje ima problem.

column3: They added that moving children to the tent city without providing enough time to prepare them emotionally or to say goodbye to friends could compound trauma that many are already struggling with.
column4: Dodaju da bi seljenje djece u šatorsko naselje bez dovoljno vremena za emocionalnu pripremu ili da se oproste od prijatelja moglo izazvati traume kojih djeca imaju već i previše.

column3: British PM May accuses critics of 'playing politics' over Brexit
column4: Britanska premijerka Theresa May optužila je kritičare da se "igraju politike" s Brexitom

column3: Prime Minister Theresa May accused critics of her plans to leave the European Union of "playing politics" with Britain's future and undermining the national interest in an interview with the Sunday Times newspaper.
column4: Predsjednica vlade Theresa May u intervjuu za novine Sunday Times optužila je kritičare se s njezinim planovima za napuštanje Europske Unije "igraju politike" s britanskom budućnosti i narušavaju državni interes.

column3: Britain's Prime Minister Theresa May arrives for the Conservative Party Conference in Birmingham, Britain, September 29, 2018.
column4: Britanska predsjednica vlade Theresa May stigla je na konferenciju Konzervativne stranke u Birminghamu u Velikoj Britaniji 29. rujna 2018.

column3: In another interview next to the one with her on the newspaper's front page, her former foreign minister Boris Johnson pressed his attack of her so-called Chequers plan for Brexit, saying a proposal that Britain and the EU should collect each other's tariffs was "entirely preposterous."
column4: U drugom se intervjuu pored onog na naslovnici novina njezin bivši ministar vanjskih poslova Boris Johnson namjerio na njezin Brexit plan, tzv. plan Chequers, dodavši da je prijedlog da si Velika Britanija i EU međusobno naplaćuju poreze "potpuno apsurdan."

column3: Arrest made in shooting death of LSU's Sims
column4: ﻿Izvršeno uhićenje zbog pucnjave u kojoj je ubijen igrač LSU-a Wayde Sims

column3: Police in Baton Rouge, La., announced Saturday that a suspect has been arrested in the shooting death of LSU basketball player Wayde Sims on Friday.
column4: Policija u Baton Rougeu, Los Angeles, objavila je u subotu kako je osumnjičenik uhićen za pucnjavu u kojoj je ubijen košarkaš LSU-a Wayde Sims u petak.

column3: The Baton Rouge Police Department announced the arrest of Dyteon Simpson, 20, at an 11 a.m. ET news conference.
column4: Policijska uprava Baton Rouge najavila je uhićenje Dyteona Simpsona (20) na konferenciji za novinare u 11 sati.

column3: They had released a video of the shooting on Friday, asking for help identifying a man seen in the footage.
column4: U petak su objavili video pucnjave tražeći pomoć u identificiranju muškarca viđenog na snimci.

column3: Sims, 20, was shot and killed near Southern University's campus early Friday.
column4: Sims (20) je ustrijeljen i ubijen u blizini kampusa Južnog sveučilišta rano u petak.

column3: Wayde Sims suffered a gunshot wound to the head and ultimately died as a result, police chief Murphy J. Paul told the media Saturday, per 247sports.
column4: „Wayde Sims zadobio je prostrijelnu ranu glave te je naposljetku preminuo“, rekao je šef policije Murphy J. Paul medijima u subotu, prema 247sports vijestima.

column3: Wayde stepped in to defend his friend and was shot by Simpson.
column4: Wayde je krenuo u obranu svog prijatelja, te je Simpson pucao u njega.

column3: Simpson was questioned and admitted to being on scene, in possession of a weapon, and admitted to shooting Wayde Sims.
column4: Simpson je ispitan i priznao je da je bio na mjestu događaja, u posjedu oružja, te da je pucao u Waydea Simsa.

column3: Simpson was arrested without incident and taken into custody at East Baton Rouge Parish Police Department.
column4: Simpson je uhićen bez incidenata i priveden u policijsku upravu općine East Baton Rouge.

column3: A 6-foot-6 junior who grew up in Baton Rouge, Sims played in 32 games with 10 starts last season and averaged 17.4 minutes, 5.6 points and 2.9 rebounds per game.
column4: Sims - junior visok skoro 2 m odrastao u Baton Rougeu – prošle je sezone igrao 32 utakmice s 10 startova i prosječno 17,4 minuta, 5,6 poena i 2,9 skokova po utakmici.

column3: LeBron to make Lakers debut Sunday in San Diego
column4: LeBron će odigrati debitantsku utakmicu za LA Lakerse u nedjelju u San Diegu

column3: The wait is nearly over for fans looking to see LeBron James make his first start for the Los Angeles Lakers.
column4: Čekanju je došao kraj za sve fanove koji žele vidjeti LeBronov debi u dresu LA Lakersa.

column3: Lakers coach Luke Walton has announced that James will play in Sunday's preseason opener against the Denver Nuggets in San Diego.
column4: Trener Lakersa Luke Walton najavio je da će LeBron igrati na otvaranju predsezone protiv Denver Nuggetsa u nedjelju u San Diegu.

column3: But just how many minutes he'll play has yet to be determined.
column4: No, koliko će točno minuta igrati još nije odlučeno.

column3: It will be more than one and less than 48, said Walton on the Lakers" official website.
column4: „Igrat će više od jedne minute, a manje od 48", izjavio je Walton na službenim stranicama kluba.

column3: Lakers reporter Mike Trudell tweeted that James will likely play limited minutes.
column4: Mike Trudell, reporter Lakersa, objavio je na Twitteru da će LeBron najvjerojatnije igrati ograničen broj minuta.

column3: Following practice earlier this week, James was asked about his plans for the Lakers" six-game preseason schedule.
column4: Nakon treninga ovog tjedna LeBrona su pitali kakvi su njegovi planovi za šest utakmica predsezone koje su predviđene rasporedom Lakersa.

column3: I don't need preseason games at this stage of my career to get ready, he said.
column4: „U ovom stadiju svoje karijere nisu mi potrebne predsezonske utakmice da bih se pripremio", rekao je.

column3: Scherzer wants to play spoiler vs. Rockies
column4: Scherzer želi igrati spojler protiv Rockiesa

column3: With the Nationals eliminated from playoff contention, there wasn't much reason to force another start.
column4: S obzirom na to da su Washington Nationalsi izbačeni iz natjecanja za doigravanje, baš i nije bilo nekog razloga za još jedan početak.

column3: But the ever-competitive Scherzer hopes to take the mound on Sunday against the Colorado Rockies, but only if there are still playoff implications for the Rockies, who hold a one-game lead over the Los Angeles Dodgers in the NL West.
column4: Međutim, Scherzer, natjecateljska duha kao i uvijek, se nada se da će u nedjelju moći bacati protiv Colorado Rockiesa, no samo ako i dalje ima implikacija o doigravanju za Rockiese, koji vode za jednu utakmicu protiv Los Angeles Dodgersa u Nacionalnoj ligi Zapad.

column3: The Rockies clinched at least a wild-card spot with a 5-2 win over the Nationals on Friday night, but are still looking to lock up their first division title.
column4: Iako su Rockiesi u petak navečer osvojili wild-card mjesto pobjedom 5-2 protiv Nationalsa, i dalje si žele osigurati naslov u prvoj ligi.

column3:
Even though we're playing for nothing, at least we can be able to toe the rubber knowing that the atmosphere here in Denver with the crowd and the other team would be playing at probably the highest level of any point I would face this year.	„Publika u Denveru i drugi tim očekuju najbolji mogući rezultat ove godine. Bacat ćemo, pa makar ništa ne osvojili. 
reuters.218921	st10	Why wouldn't I want to compete in that?
column4: Zašto se ne bih volio natjecati?“2

column3: The Nationals have yet to announce a starter for Sunday, but are reportedly inclined to let Scherzer pitch in such a situation.
column4: Washington Nationals još uvijek nisu najavili startera za nedjeljnu utakmicu, no navodno razmišljaju o tome da puste Scherzera da baca.

column3: Scherzer, who would be making his 34th start, threw a bullpen session on Thursday and would be pitching on his normal rest Sunday.
column4: Scherzer, koji će po 34. put bacati na početku, u četvrtak je vježbao u bullpenu, dok će u nedjelju, kada inače odmara, igrati.

column3: The Washington right-hander is 18-7 with a 2.53 ERA and 300 strikeouts in 220 2/3 innings this season.
column4: Desni bacač Nationalsa postigao je rezultate 18-7 s ERA-om od 2,53 i 300 napada u 220 2/3 izmjena ove sezone.

column3: U.S. ambassador accuses China of 'bullying' with 'propaganda ads'
column4: Američki veleposlanik optužio Kinu za propagandnu ofenzivu

column3: A week after an official Chinese newspaper ran a four-page ad in a U.S. daily touting the mutual benefits of U.S.-China trade, the U.S. ambassador to China accused Beijing of using the American press to spread propaganda.
column4: Tjedan dana nakon što su službene kineske novine objavile oglas od četiri stranice kojim se promiču prednosti trgovinskih odnosa između SAD-a i Kine, američki veleposlanik u Kini optužio je kinesku vladu za korištenje američkog tiska u svrhu širenja propagande.

column3: U.S. President Donald Trump last Wednesday referred to the China Daily's paid supplement in the Des Moines Register - the state of Iowa's biggest selling newspaper - after accusing China of seeking to meddle in the Nov. 6 U.S. congressional elections, a charge China denies.
column4: Predsjednik SAD-a Donald Trump prošlu se srijedu osvrnuo na plaćeni oglas od dnevnog lista China Daily koji se našao u najprodavanijim novinama u državi Iowi, Des Moines Register. Trump je prethodno optužio Kinu za pokušaj uplitanja u izbore za američki Kongres koji će se održati 6. studenog, što Kina poriče.

column3: Trump's accusation that Beijing was trying to meddle in U.S. elections marked what U.S. officials told Reuters was a new phase in an escalating campaign by Washington to put pressure on China.
column4: Trumpova optužba o miješanju kineske vlade u američke izbore započela je, kako su za Reuters izjavili američki dužnosnici, novu fazu pojačane kampanje iz Washingtona čiji je cilj vršiti pritisak na Kinu.

column3: While it is normal for foreign governments to place advertisements to promote trade, Beijing and Washington are currently locked in an escalating trade war that has seen them level rounds of tariffs on each other's imports.
column4: Iako je uobičajena praksa da strane vlade plaćaju oglase koji promiču trgovinu u američkim novinama, SAD i Kina trenutno su usred sve goreg trgovinskog rata u sklopu kojeg jedna drugoj nameću uvozne carine.

column3: China's retaliatory tariffs early in the trade war were designed to hit exporters in states such as Iowa that supported Trump's Republican Party, Chinese and U.S. experts have said.
column4: Stručnjaci iz Kine i SAD-a tvrde da su osvetničke carine koje je Kina uvela rano u trgovinskom ratu bile osmišljene s ciljem nanošenja štete izvoznicima u državama poput Iowe koje podržavaju Trumpovu Republikansku stranku.

column3: Terry Branstad, the U.S. ambassador to China and the former longtime governor of Iowa, a major exporter of agricultural goods to China, said Beijing had hurt American workers, farmers and businesses.
column4: Američki veleposlanik u Kini Terry Branstad, koji je dugo vremena bio guverner Iowe koja je jedan od većih izvoznika poljoprivrednih proizvoda u Kinu, izjavio je da je kineska vlada već nanijela štetu američkim radnicima, poljoprivrednicima i poduzećima.

column3: China, Branstad wrote in an opinion piece in Sunday's Des Moines Register, "is now doubling down on that bullying by running propaganda ads in our own free press."
column4: Branstad je u kolumni za nedjeljno izdanje lista Des Moines Register napisao da objavom propagandnih oglasa u američkim novinama Kina nastavlja ofenzivu.

column3: In disseminating its propaganda, China's government is availing itself of America's cherished tradition of free speech and a free press by placing a paid advertisement in the Des Moines Register, Branstad wrote.
column4: „Širenjem svoje propagande kineska vlada se okorištava čuvenom američkom tradicijom slobodnog govora i tiska tako da objavljuje plaćene oglase u listu Des Moines Register“, napisao je Branstad u kolumni.

column3: In contrast, at the newsstand down the street here in Beijing, you will find limited dissenting voices and will not see any true reflection of the disparate opinions that the Chinese people may have on China's troubling economic trajectory, given that media is under the firm thumb of the Chinese Communist Party, he wrote.
column4: „Usporedite to s obližnjim kioskom za novine ovdje u Pekingu. Pronaći ćete malo neusuglašenih stajališta i nećete vidjeti pravi odraz raznolikih mišljenja kineskog naroda o zabrinjavajućoj budućnosti kineskog gospodarstva budući da su njihovi mediji u šaci Komunističke partije Kine“, napisao je.

column3: He added that "one of China's most prominent newspapers dodged the offer to publish" his article, although he did not say which newspaper.
column4: Nadodao je da su „u jednim od najutjecajnijih kineskih novina“ odbili objavljivanje njegove kolumne, ali nije rekao o kojim se novinama radi.

column3: 'How dare you?' Thunberg's U.N. speech inspires Dutch climate protesters
column4: „Kako se usuđujete?“ Govor Grete Thunberg pred UN-om nadahnuo nizozemske prosvjednike protiv klimatskih promjena

column3: Thousands of Dutch children skipped school to join a global climate strike on Friday, blocking traffic and asking their leaders "how dare you?" in a reference to Swedish teenage activist Greta Thunberg's speech at the United Nations.
column4: Tisuće nizozemske djece prošlog su petka izostale iz škole kako bi se pridružile globalnom klimatskom prosvjedu. Prosvjednici su blokirali promet i pitali svoje političke vođe „kako se usuđujete?“, aludirajući pri tome na govor koji je Greta Thunberg, švedska tinejdžerica i aktivistica protiv klimatskih promjena, održala pred Ujedinjenim narodima.

column3: A participant holds a drawing depicting Swedish environmental activist Greta Thunberg during a protest march to call for action against climate change, in The Hague, Netherlands September 27, 2019. REUTERS/Piroschka van de Wouw
column4: Jedna od sudionica drži crtež švedske ekološke aktivistice Grete Thunberg za vrijeme prosvjeda protiv klimatskih promjena u nizozemskom gradu Hagu, 27. rujna 2019. REUTERS/Piroschka van de Wouw

column3: Turnout at the march in The Hague exceeded expectations with organizers estimating the crowd at about 35,000. Police were forced to reroute the march to a location with more space.
column4: Odaziv na prosvjed u Hagu nadmašio je očekivanja. Organizatori procjenjuju da se skupilo 35 000 ljudi. Policajci su bili prisiljeni preusmjeriti prosvjed na lokaciju s više prostora.

column3: Thunberg, 16, gave an impassioned address at the United Nations in New York this week, after millions of people worldwide joined a climate strike protest last Friday in the run-up to a U.N. climate summit.
column4: Šesnaestogodišnja Thunberg ovog je tjedna u New Yorku održala vatren govor pred Ujedinjenim narodima nakon što su se prošlog petka milijuni ljudi širom svijeta pridružili prosvjedu protiv klimatskih promjena uoči UN-ovog klimatskog summita.

column3: This strike is going to have a lot of effect when people keep showing up, not just today but also in the future and we see different kinds of people from all walks of life, said protester Reinder Rustema.
column4: „Ovaj štrajk imat će velik učinak. Ljudi će i dalje dolaziti na prosvjede, ne samo danas već i u budućnosti. Pridružili su se različiti ljudi koji pripadaju svim društvenim slojevima“, izjavio je prosvjednik Reinder Rustema.

column3: Banging drums and holding pictures of Thunberg, protesters walked through the city center with placards reading: "For the Greta good," "Don't be a fossil fool," and "You will die of old age, we will die of climate change."
column4: Udarajući bubnjeve i noseći slike Grete Thunberg, prosvjednici su hodali kroz grad s transparentima na kojima su pisali slogani poput: „Uz Gretu za opće dobro“, „Ne budite fosilne budale“ i „Vi ćete umrijeti od starosti, mi od klimatskih promjena.“

column3: I understand their concerns, I believe they are being heard, Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte told journalists at a weekly press briefing within earshot of the protests. "We have presented very ambitious plans to deal with these problems. But we have to do it in a smart way, which also creates jobs."
column4: „Shvaćam njihovu zabrinutost, vjerujem da se njihov glas čuje“, novinarima je rekao nizozemski premijer Mark Rutte na tjednoj tiskovnoj konferenciju koja se održavala u neposrednoj blizini protesta.  „Iznijeli smo vrlo ambiciozne planove za rješavanje ovih problema. Ali to moramo učiniti na inteligentan način, na način koji će također stvoriti radna mjesta“.

column3: Thunberg's brief address electrified the start of the summit aimed at mobilizing government and business to break international paralysis over carbon emissions, which hit record highs last year despite decades of warnings from scientists.
column4: Kratko obraćanje Grete Thunberg elektriziralo je početak summita čiji je cilj bio mobilizirati vlade i poduzeća u svrhu prekidanja međunarodne paralize po pitanju ograničavanja emisija ugljikovog dioksida. Emisije su prošle godine dosegnule novi rekord unatoč upozorenjima koje znanstvenici izriču već desetljećima.

column3: This is all wrong. I shouldn't be up here. I should be back in school on the other side of the ocean yet you all come to us young people for hope. How dare you? she said, her voice quavering with emotion.
column4: „Ovo se nije smjelo dogoditi.  Ne bih trebala biti ovdje. Trebala bih biti u školi na drugoj strani oceana, a vi od nas, od mladih ljudi očekujete da vam pruže nadu. Kako se usuđujete?“

column3: The Netherlands, with 17 million inhabitants, generated less than 7 percent of all energy from sustainable sources in 2017, compared to 15 percent in Germany and over half of all energy in Sweden.
column4: Nizozemska, u kojoj živi 7 milijuna stanovnika, 2017. je generirala manje od 7 posto svoje energije iz obnovljivih izvora. To je bila znatno manja brojka u odnosu na njemačkih 15 i švedskih 50 posto.

column3: The government has pledged to halve CO2 emissions from 1990 levels by 2030, but by 2017 had only achieved a 13 percent cut.
column4: Vlada je obećala da će do 2030. prepoloviti emisije ugljikovog dioksida, ali do 2017. uspjela ih je smanjiti samo za 13 posto.

column3: Thunberg was taking part in a protest in Canada on Friday where U.N. aviation leaders were gathering in Montreal to discuss plane emissions targets.
column4: Thunberg je prošlog petka sudjelovala u protestu u Kanadi uoči susreta čelnika zemalja UN-a u Montrealu na kojem su raspravljali o ciljnim vrijednostima emisija ugljikovog dioksida za zračni promet.

column3: Sales of fake MAC pigments are widespread across the Internet, so people often assume they must be safe or even identical to genuine MAC products.

column3: Unfortunately, that is not the case.

column3: Fake MAC pigments have been analyzed to contain chemical irritants, bacterial contamination (including in at least one case e. coli) or even toxins like lead and carcinogens.
column4: Za lažne MAC pigmente se analizom dokazalo da sadržavaju iritirajuća kemijska sredstva, bakterijsku kontaminaciju (uključujući najmanje jedan slučaj e. coli) ili čak toksine poput olova i karcinogena.

column3: As the owner of two cats myself, after the second read-through, I realized that this novel has much to teach about the critical importance of dealing with fur and dust.I could only give four stars, though, because the cats do not agree, and indeed wish I had not made this purchase.

Međutim, mogu ga ocijeniti samo s četiri zvjezdice, i to jer se mačke ne slažu, a i zato što bi mi zaista bilo draže da nisam kupio ovu knjigu.

column3: The most entertaining aspect of this book is the artful use of language which almost masks the fact that the prophet indeed speaks but says nothing.
