column3: Waste of $
column4: Bacanje novca

column3: If you want your bird to interact with you, then interact with your bird.
column4: Ako želite da vaša ptica komunicira s vama, komunicirajte vi s njom.

column3: Parrots have the mental capacity of a 3-5 year old child.
column4: Papige imaju mentalni kapacitet djece između 3-5 godina.

column3: This is like plopping your child down in front of the TV and calling it quality time.
column4: Ovo je kao da posjednete djecu pred televiziju i mislite da je dobro utrošeno vrijeme.

column3: Parrots learn to communicate dynamically not by rote.
column4: Papige uče komunicirati dinamično a ne napamet.

column3: I have 5 parrots and all are chatty because we chat, while cleaning, cooking, doing laundry.. whatever.
column4: Imam 5 papiga i sve su pričljive jer pričam s njima, dok čistim, kuham, perem... što god.

column3: Turn off the TV and read aloud, talk, sing, dance.. be one of the flock.
column4: Isključite televiziju i čitajte naglas, pričajte, pjevajte, plešite... budite dio jata.

column3: Feathered Phonics volume 1
column4: Feathered Phonics 1. dio

column3: The CD is a good idea for teaching a bird to speak,but there are words on it that would never be spoken in our home so why teach them to the bird.
column4: CD je dobra ideja ako želite naučiti pticu da govori, ali na njemu se nalaze riječi koje nikada nećete čuti u našem domu, stoga zašto naučiti pticu da ih govori?

column3: I will look through the other choices of CD's and try to find one with different words.
column4: Proći ću kroz ostale izbore CD-ova i pokušati naći CD s drugim riječima.

column3: Waste of Money
column4: Bačen novac

column3: This is the biggest waste of money - do not buy it - it will not work!It's just people saying a certain word, then a 10 second pause ... then a different word and another 10 second pause.
column4: Ovo je najuzaludnije potrošen novac - nemojte to kupiti - neće raditi! Ljudi samo kažu određenu riječ i onda slijedi 10 sekundi pauze ... zatim druga riječ i sljedećih 10 sekundi pauze.

column3: You can create your own if you really want to try this.But you really should not leave this on for your bird all day - it should be done in 10 minute intervals only or your bird may get irritated by it (i know i get irritated by it after only 2 words).Don't waste your money on this.
column4: Možete napraviti vlastiti ako ga stvarno želite isprobati. Ali stvarno ga ne bi trebali ostaviti uključenog cijeli dan za svoju pticu - treba se koristiti samo u razdobljima od 10 minuta ili će vam se ptica uznemiriti (znam da se ja uznemirim nakon samo 2 riječi). Ne bacajte novac na ovo.

column3: Macedonians go to polls in referendum on changing country's name
column4: Makedonci izašli na izbore zbog referenduma o promjeni imena države

column3: Voters will vote Sunday on whether to change their country's name to the "Republic of North Macedonia."
column4: Birači će u nedjelju glasati žele li promijeniti ime svoje države u "Republika Sjeverna Makedonija".

column3: The popular vote was set up in a bid to resolve a decades-long dispute with neighboring Greece, which has its own province called Macedonia.
column4: Glasanje je pokrenuto u pokušaju da se riješi spor sa susjednom Grčkom koji traje već desetljećima jer Grčka ima vlastitu pokrajinu po imenu Makedonija.

column3: Athens has long insisted that its northern neighbor's name represents a claim on its territory and has repeatedly objected to its membership bids for the EU and NATO.
column4: Atena je dugo ustrajala na tome da je ime njenog sjevernog susjeda težnja za njenim teritorijem te se više puta protivila njenom članstvu u EU-u i NATO-u.

column3: Macedonian President Gjorge Ivanov, an opponent of the plebiscite on the name change, has said he will disregard the vote.
column4: Makedonski predsjednik Đorge Ivanov, protivnik plebiscitu o promjeni imena, je rekao da će zanemariti to glasanje.

column3: However, supporters of the referendum, including Prime Minister Zoran Zaev, argue that the name change is simply the price to pay to join the EU and NATO.
column4: Međutim, pobornici referenduma, uključujući premijera Zorana Zaeva, kažu da je promjena imena samo cijena koju moraju platiti za ulazak u EU i NATO.

column3: Eilidh Doyle will be "voice for athletes" on Scottish Athletics board
column4: ﻿Eilidh Doyle bit će „glas atletičara" u odboru Škotskog atletskog saveza

column3: Eilidh Doyle has been elected to the board of Scottish Athletics as a non-executive director at the governing body's annual general meeting.
column4: Eilidh Doyle izabrana je u odbor Škotskog atletskog saveza kao savjetodavni član na godišnjoj općoj sjednici tog upravljačkog tijela.

column3: Doyle is Scotland's most decorated track and field athlete and chairman Ian Beattie described the move as a great opportunity for those guiding the sport to benefit from her wide-ranging experience at international level over the past decade.
column4: Doyle je najodlikovanija škotska atletičarka te je predsjednik Ian Beattie opisao taj potez kao sjajnu priliku za vodeće ljude atletike da profitiraju od njenog širokog iskustva na međunarodnoj razini tijekom prošlog desetljeća.

column3: Eilidh has massive respect across the Scottish, UK and world athletics community and we are sure athletics in Scotland would benefit hugely by bringing her on to the board, Beattie said.
column4: „Eilidh uživa veliko poštovanje u škotskoj, britanskoj i svjetskoj atletskoj zajednici te smo sigurni da će njezin dolazak u odbor donijeti veliko korist škotskoj atletici", izjavio je Beattie.

column3: Doyle said: "I am keen to act as a voice for athletes and I am hoping I can really contribute and help guide the sport in Scotland."
column4: Doyle je rekla: „Radujem se tome što ću predstavljati glas atletičara i nadam se da mogu puno pridonijeti i pomoći upravljanju atletikom u Škotskoj."

column3: The American, who won the 200 metres and 400 metres at the 1996 Games in Atlanta among his total of four Olympic golds and is now a regular BBC pundit, was left unable to walk after suffering a transient ischemic attack.
column4: Amerikanac, čija četiri olimpijska zlata uključuju ona na 200 i 400 metara na Olimpijskim igrama u Atlanti 1996., a danas je redoviti stručni komentator na BBC-u, izgubio je sposobnost hoda nakon što je pretrpio tranzitornu ishemijsku ataku.

column3: He wrote on Twitter: "A month ago today I suffered a stroke.
column4: Na Twitteru je napisao: „Prije točno mjesec dana doživio sam moždani udar.

column3: I could not walk.
column4: Nisam mogao hodati.

column3: Doctors said only time will tell if I will recover or to what degree.
column4: Liječnici su rekli da će tek vrijeme pokazati hoću li se oporaviti i do koje mjere.

column3: Its been grueling work but made a full recovery, re-learned how to walk and today doing agility drills!
column4: Bilo je veoma naporno, ali sam se potpuno oporavio, ponovno naučio hodati, a danas radim vježbe pokretljivosti!

column3: Thanks for the messages of encouragement!"
column4: Hvala vam na porukama ohrabrenja!"

column3: Ayr 38 - 17 Melrose: Unbeaten Ayr go top
column4: ﻿Ayr - Melrose 38:17 Neporaženi Ayr penje se na vrh ljestvice

column3: Two late tries may have skewed the final result somewhat, but there is no doubt Ayr deserved to triumph in this wonderfully-entertaining Tennent's Premiership match of the day.
column4: Dva pokušaja pred kraj utakmice mogla su ponešto izmijeniti rezultat, ali nema sumnje da je Ayr zasluženo pobijedio u današnjoj nevjerojatno zanimljivoj utakmici Tennent’s prvenstva.

column3: They now top the table, the only unbeaten side of the ten.
column4: Sada su na vrhu ljestvice, jedini neporaženi tim od njih deset.

column3: In the end, it was their superior defence, as much as their better chance-taking, which carried the home side and coach Peter Murchie had every right to be pleased.
column4: Na kraju, pobijedili su zbog bolje obrane, kao i uzimanja većih rizika, a trener Peter Murchie može se ponositi njihovim nastupom.

column3: We've been tested over our games this far, and we're still unbeaten, so I have to be happy, he said.
column4: „Testiralo nas se u dosadašnjim utakmicama, a i dalje smo neporaženi, tako da mogu jedino biti sretan“, rekao je.

column3: Robyn Christie of Melrose said: "Credit to Ayr, they took their chances better than we did."
column4: Robyn Christie iz Melrosea rekao je: „Svaka čast Ayru, iskoristili su prilike bolje od nas.“

column3: Grant Anderson's 14th minute try, converted by Frazier Climo, put Ayr in front, but, a yellow card for Scotland cap Rory Hughes, released for the game by Warriors, allowed Melrose to make numbers tell and Jason Baggot grabbed an unconverted try.
column4: Polaganje Granta Andersona u 14. minuti, uz pretvaranje Fraziera Clima, dovelo je Ayr u vodstvo, ali žuti karton za škotskog kapetana Rorya Hughesa iz utakmice s Warriorsima, omogućio je Melroseu realiziranje te prednosti u rezultatu te je Jason Baggot ostvario polaganje bez pretvaranja.

column3: Climo stretched the Ayr lead with a penalty, before, right on half-time, he scored then converted a solo try to make it 17-5 to Ayr at the break.
column4: Climo je produžio vodstvo Ayra s kaznenim zgoditkom, prije nego je, malo prije poluvremena, ostvario je zgoditak i samostalno polaganje uz pretvaranje te osigurao rezultat 17:5 za Ayr na poluvremenu.

column3: But Melrose began the second half well and Patrick Anderson's try, converted by Baggot, reduced the leeway to five points.
column4: Ipak, Melrose je dobro započeo drugu polovicu, a polaganje Patricka Andersona uz pretvaranje Baggota smanjilo je razliku na pet bodova.

column3: There was then a lengthy hold-up for a serious injury to Ruaridh Knott, who was stretchered off, and from the restart, Ayr surged further ahead through a Stafford McDowall try, converted by Climo.
column4: Uslijedila je dugačka stanka zbog ozbiljne ozljede Ruaridha Knotta, kojeg su medicinski tehničari odveli s terena, a nakon nje je Ayr ostvario još veću prednost s polaganjem Stafforda McDowwalla uz Climovo pretvaranje.

column3: Ayr acting captain Blair Macpherson was then yellow-carded, and again, Melrose made the extra man pay with an unconverted Bruce Colvine try, at the end of a spell of fierce pressure.
column4: Privremeni kapetan Ayra Blair Macpherson zatim je dobio žuti karton i Melrose je opet iskoristio igrača više s polaganjem Brucea Colvinea bez pretvaranja na kraju perioda žestokog pritiska.

column3: The home side came back, however, and when Struan Hutchinson was yellow-carded for tackling Climo without the ball, from the penalty line-out, MacPherson touched down at the back of the advancing Ayr maul.
column4: Domaća strana je ipak uzvratila te kada je Struan Hutchinson dobio žuti karton za rušenje Clima bez lopte, u području za kazneni udarac, MacPherson je ostvario polaganje iza nadolazećeg mlina Ayra.

column3: Climo converted, as he did again almost from the restart, after Kyle Rowe gathered David Armstrong's box kick and sent flanker Gregor Henry away for the home side's fifth try.
column4: Climo je napravio pretvaranje, kao i nakon početka druge polovice, nakon što je Kyle Rowe pokupio box kick Davida Armstronga i poslao krilo Gregora Henrya dalje za peto polaganje domaćeg tima.

column3: Health secretary writes to EU workers at NHS Scotland over Brexit fears
column4: ﻿Ministrica zdravstva obraća se radnicima iz EU-a Nacionalne zdravstvene službe u Škotskoj u vezi strahova zbog Brexita

column3: The Health Secretary has written to EU staff working in Scotland's NHS to express the country's gratitude and wish for them to stay on post-Brexit.
column4: Ministrica zdravstva pisala je osoblju iz EU-a koje radi u škotskoj Nacionalnoj zdravstvenoj službi da izrazi zahvalnost svoje zemlje i želju da ostanu raditi i nakon Brexita.

column3: Jeane Freeman MSP sent a letter with less than six months to go until the UK withdraws from the EU.
column4: Jeane Freeman, članica škotskog parlamenta, poslala je pismo manje od 6 mjeseci prije izlaska Ujedinjenog Kraljevstva iz EU-a.

column3: The Scottish Government has already committed to meet the cost of settled status applications for EU citizens working in its devolved public services.
column4: Škotska vlada već se posvetila rješavanju financijskih troškova zahtjeva za boravišni status za građane EU-a koji rade u njegovim decentraliziranim javnim službama.

column3: In her letter, Ms Freeman wrote: "Over the summer, negotiations between the UK and EU on withdrawal have continued, heading towards expected decisions this autumn.
column4: U svojem pismu, Freeman je napisala: „Preko ljeta su se pregovori između UK-a i EU-a o povlačenju nastavili te vode k očekivanoj odluci ove jeseni.

column3: But the UK Government has also been stepping up its preparations for a possible no-deal scenario.
column4: No vlada UK-a također se snažnije priprema i za mogući scenarij bez dogovora.

column3: I know this must be a very unsettling time for all of you.
column4: Znam da ovo vrijeme zasigurno uznemiruje sve vas.

column3: That is why I wanted to reiterate now how much I value the contribution of every member of staff, regardless of their nationality.
column4: Zato sam htjela ponoviti koliko cijenim doprinos svakog člana osoblja, bez obzira na nacionalnost.

column3: Colleagues from across the EU, and beyond, bring valuable experience and skills that strengthen and improve the work of the health service, and benefit the patients and communities we serve.
column4: Kolege iz cijelog EU-a i izvan njega donose vrijedno iskustvo i vještine koje osnažuju i poboljšavaju rad zdravstvene službe te pogoduju pacijentima i zajednicama kojim služimo.

column3: Scotland is absolutely your home and we very much want you to stay here."
column4: Škotska je u potpunosti vaš dom i istinski želimo da ostanete ovdje.“

column3: Rangers' Graham Dorrans optimistic ahead of Rapid Vienna clash
column4: Graham Dorrans iz Rangersa optimističan uoči utakmice s Rapid Wienom

column3: Rangers host Rapid Vienna on Thursday, knowing that victory over the Austrians, following the impressive draw in Spain against Villarreal earlier this month, will put them in a strong position to qualify from Group G of the Europa League.
column4: Rangersi će u utorak ugostiti Rapid Wien. Nakon impresivnog remija u Španjolskoj protiv Villarreala ranije ovog mjeseca, Rangersi znaju da će pobjedom nad Austrijancima imati dobre šanse da se kvalificiraju za skupinu G Europske lige.

column3: A knee injury prevented midfielder Graham Dorrans from making his first appearance of the season until the 2-2 draw with Villarreal but he believes Rangers can use that result as a springboard to greater things.
column4: Zbog ozljede koljena, vezni igrač Graham Dorrans nije ostvario svoj prvi nastup u sezoni sve do remija 2-2 s Villarrealom, ali vjeruje da će Rangersi iskoristiti taj rezultat kao odskočnu dasku za veće uspjehe.

column3: It was a good point for us because Villarreal are a good side, said the 31-year-old.
column4: To je bio važan bod za nas jer je Villarreal dobra momčad, izjavio je tridesetjednogodišnjak.

column3: We went into the game believing we could get something and came away with a point.	Ušli smo u igru s uvjerenjem da bismo nešto mogli izvući iz nje, a završili smo s bodom.
Maybe we could have nicked it in the end but, overall, a draw was probably a fair result.
column4: Možda smo i mogli pobijediti na kraju, ali, sve u svemu, izjednačenje je vjerojatno pravedan rezultat.

column3: They were probably better in the first half and we came out in the second half and were the better side.
column4: Oni su vjerojatno bili bolji u prvom poluvremenu, a mi u drugom.

column3: Going into Thursday, it's another big European night.
column4: U četvrtak nas očekuje još jedna uzbudljiva noć Europske lige.

column3: Hopefully, we can get three points but that will be tough game because they had a good result in their last game but, with the crowd behind us, I'm sure we can push on and get a positive result.
column4: Nadamo se da ćemo dobiti tri boda, ali to neće biti tako lako jer su postigli dobar rezultat u svojoj posljednjoj utakmici, ali vjerujem da ćemo s publikom iza nas uspjeti izgurati i postići pozitivan rezultat.

column3: Last year was definitely tough, between everything that happened with my injuries and the changes at the club itself but there's a feelgood factor about the place now.
column4: Prošla godina svakako je bila teška, kako zbog mojih ozljeda tako i zbog promjena u klubu, ali je trenutno ovdje dobar osjećaj u zraku.

column3: The squad's good and the boys are really enjoying it; the training's good.
column4: Ekipa je dobra i dečki zaista uživaju; treninzi su dobri.

column3: Hopefully, we can push on now, put last season behind us and be successful."
column4: Nadamo se da ćemo sad uspjeti izgurati, zaboraviti na prošlu sezonu i uspjeti."

column3: Still Game star looks set for new career in restaurant industry
column4: ﻿Zvijezda škotske serije „Still Game“ spreman na buduću karijeru u ugostiteljstvu.

column3: Still Game star Ford Kieran looks set to move into the hospitality industry after it was discovered he's been named as the director of a licensed restaurants company.
column4: Čini se da je Ford Kieran, zvijezda škotske serije „Still Game“, spreman preći u ugostiteljsku profesiju, jer je objavljeno da je dobio poziciju direktora ovlaštenog lanca restorana.

column3: The 56-year-old plays Jack Jarvis on the popular BBC show, which he writes and co-stars with long-time comedy partner Greg Hemphill.
column4: Ovaj 56-godišnjak igrao je ulogu Jacka Jarvisa u popularnoj BBC-evoj seriji za koju je pisao scenarij i surađivao sa svojim dugogodišnjim partnerom komičarom Gregom Hemphillom.

column3: The duo have announced that the upcoming ninth series will be the final one in the show's run, and it appears Kiernan is planning for life after Craiglang.
column4: Slavni duo objavio je da će nadolazeća deveta sezona serije ujedno biti i posljednja te se čini da Kiernan već ima planove što će raditi nakon što završi njegov fiktivni život u Craiglangu, mjestu radnje serije.

column3: According to official record listings, he is the director of Adriftmorn Limited.
column4: Prema trenutno dostupnim informacijama, Kieran je postao direktor tvrtke „Adriftmorn Limited“.

column3: The actor declined to comment on the story, though a Scottish Sun source hinted that Kiernan was looking to get involved in Glasgow's "thriving restaurant trade."
column4: Ovaj britanski glumac odbio je dati komentar na tu temu, no izvor za novine „Scottish Sun“ dao je natuknuti da se Kiernan nastoji upustiti u Glasgowu „uspješnu ugostiteljsku scenu“:

column3: Nancy Pelosi is subject of book by daughter Christine Pelosi
column4: ﻿Knjigu o Nancy Pelosi napisat će njena kći Christine Pelosi

column3: An upcoming book on House Speaker Nancy Pelosi comes from someone who knows her well, daughter Christine Pelosi.
column4: Novu knjigu o predsjednici Zastupničkog doma Kongresa SAD-a Nancy Pelosi napisat će netko tko je dobro poznaje – njena kći,  Christine Pelosi.

column3: The Nancy Pelosi Way will be released Nov. 26, Skyhorse Publishing announced Thursday. Christine Pelosi's book will examine how a mother of five became the first female house speaker and her current leadership of House Democrats during the Trump administration. According to Skyhorse, Christine Pelosi will weave together "the professional and personal experiences" of her mother.
column4: Izdavačka kuća Skyhorse Publishing u četvrtak je objavila kako će knjiga pod nazivom „Način Nancy Pelosi“ izaći 26. studenog. Christine će u knjizi analizirati kako je majka petero djece uspjela postati prvom ženom predsjednicom Zastupničkog doma Kongresa SAD-a, kao i način na koji vodi zastupnike Demokratske stranke za vrijeme administracije Donalda Trumpa. Skyhorse tvrdi kako će Christine spojiti „profesionalno iskustvo i privatni život“ svoje majke.

column3: Christine Pelosi is a Democratic Party strategist and author of "Campaign Boot Camp" and "Campaign Boot Camp 2.0." Pelosi's sister, Alexandra Pelosi, is a filmmaker and journalist who has made several documentaries about contemporary politics.
column4: Christine Pelosi je strateg Demokratske stranke  i autorica knjiga „Kampanja – rat drugim sredstvima“ te „Kampanja – rat drugim sredstvima 2.0“. Njena sestra Alexandra Pelosi je redateljica i novinarka koja je snimila nekoliko dokumentarnih filmova o aktualnim političkim temama.

column3: French chemical fire extinguished as questions mount
column4: Ugašene zapaljene kemikalije u Francuskoj dok se pitanja gomilaju

column3: French authorities and Normandy residents are clearing up residue from a huge fire at a chemical plant as a foul stench continues to spread over a swath of territory.
column4: Francuske vlasti i stanovnici Normandije čiste ostatke velikog požara u kemijskoj tvornici dok se smrad nastavlja širiti velikim dijelom tog područja.

column3: No one was injured in Thursday's fire at a lubricant plant in Rouen, but residents have expressed concern about possible health risks and consequences for the nearby Seine River.
column4: Nema ozlijeđenih u požaru koji je izbio u četvrtak u tvornici lubrikanata u Rouenu, ali stanovnici su izrazili zabrinutost oko mogućih zdravstvenih problema i posljedica koje požar može imati na rijeku Seinu.

column3: The head of the regional administration said Friday the fire was extinguished Thursday night after nearly 24 hours. Firefighters are still on the scene.
column4: Šef lokalne uprave u petak je izjavio da je požar ugašen u četvrtak navečer nakon gotovo 24 sata. Vatrogasci su još na požarištu.

column3: The administration warned of a new odor released after the fire was put out, saying it could spread to neighboring regions.
column4: Uprava je upozorila na novi miris koji se širi nakon što je vatra ugašena, tvrdeći da bi se mogao proširiti do susjednih regija.

column3: Interior Minister Christophe Castaner said people in fragile health should remain indoors through Friday night.
column4: Ministar unutarnjih poslova Christophe Castaner izjavio je da bi ljudi slabijeg zdravlja trebali ostati u kućama u petak navečer.

column3: The cause of the fire is being investigated. The plant is among the highest-risk industrial sites in Europe.
column4: Uzrok požara još se istražuje. Tvornica je među najriskantnijim industrijskim postrojenjima u Europi.

column3: Man set alight on doorstep 'in targeted attack'
column4: Zapalili muškarca na kućnom pragu, radi se o 'ciljanom napadu'

column3: A man has been set alight on his doorstep in what police believe is a targeted attack.
column4: Muškarac je zapaljen na vlastitom kućnom pragu, a policija smatra da se radi o ciljanom napadu.

column3: The 48-year-old was soaked in flammable liquid, believed to be petrol, before bursting into flames outside his home in Skelmersdale, West Lancashire.
column4: 48-godišnjak je bio poliven zapaljivom tekućinom, vjerojatno benzinom, prije nego je zapaljen ispred svog doma u Skelmersdaleu u Zapadnom Lancashireu.

column3: He is in hospital in a critical but stable condition after suffering serious burns.
column4: Trenutno se nalazi u bolnici u kritičnom, ali stabilnom stanju, a pretrpio je teže opekotine.

column3: Police have launched an attempted murder inquiry after they were called to the man's house at about 1am on Thursday.
column4: Policija je pokrenula istragu o pokušaju ubojstva nakon što im je došao poziv da se upute u kuću ovog muškarca u četvrtak u 1 sat ujutro.

column3: Detective Chief Inspector Pauline Stables, leading the investigation, said: "This is a horrific incident which has left a man in a very poorly condition in hospital.
column4: Glavna inspektorica Pauline Stables koja vodi istragu rekla je: "Ovo je grozan incident zbog kojeg je čovjek u jako lošem stanju u bolnici.

column3: We are carrying out a number of enquiries to try to identify those responsible.	Provodimo niz ispitivanja kako bismo utvrdili tko je odgovoran.

While we are trying to establish a motive for what has happened, we do believe that the incident was targeted and I would like to stress that I don't believe there is any threat to the wider community at this time.	Iako pokušavamo utvrditi motiv iza ovog događaja, vjerujemo da se radi o ciljanom napadu i želimo naglasiti da ne mislimo da postoji opasnost za širu zajednicu u ovom trenutku.
Someone out there knows who has done this and I would urge them to come forward and speak to us.	Netko zna tko je ovo učinio i molila bih ga da dođe i razgovara s nama.

Has a loved one come home acting suspiciously, smelling of smoke or petrol or with unexplained injuries?	Je li netko od vaših bližnjih došao kući i ponašao se sumnjivo, mirisao na dim ili benzin ili imao neobjašnjive ozljede?
We need to find the people responsible for this dreadful crime.
column4: Moramo pronaći one odgovorne za ovaj grozni zločin.

column3: Parliament's statue of Cromwell becomes latest memorial hit by 'rewriting history' row
column4: Kip Olivera Cromwella ispred zgrade britanskog parlamenta posljednji je spomenik u nizu napada u svrhu “revidiranja povijesti”

column3: Its banishment would be poetic justice for his Taliban-like destruction of so many of England's cultural and religious artefacts carried out by his fanatical Puritan followers.
column4: Uklanjanje Cromwellovog kipa bila bi poetska pravda nakon njegova talibanskog uništavanja mnogih kulturnih i vjerskih artefakata u Engleskoj, a koje su proveli njegovi puritanski sljedbenici.

column3: But the Cromwell Society described Mr Crick's suggestion as "folly" and "attempting to rewrite history."
column4: No udruženje Cromwell opisalo je Crickove izjave kao “besmislicu” i “pokušaj da se revidira povijest”.

column3: John Goldsmith, chairman of the Cromwell Society, said: "It was inevitable in the present debate about the removal of statues that the figure of Oliver Cromwell outside the Palace of Westminster would become a target.
column4: Predsjednik udruženja John Goldsmith izjavio je: “Bilo je neizbježno da će u sklopu trenutne rasprave o uklanjanju kipova kip Olivera Cromwella, koji se nalazi ispred Westminsterske palače, postati meta napada.”

column3: The iconoclasm of the English civil wars was neither ordered nor carried out by Cromwell.
column4: Cromwell nije ni naredio ni izvršio uništenje ikona engleskih građanskih ratova.

column3: Perhaps the wrong Cromwell would be sacrificed for the actions of his ancestor Thomas in the previous century.
column4: Možda će pogrešni Cromwell biti žrtvovan zbog djela svog pretka Thomasa iz prethodnog stoljeća.

column3: Sir William Hamo Thorneycroft's magnificent representation of Cromwell is evidence of 19th century opinion and part of the historiography of a figure who many believe is still worth celebrating.
column4: Veličanstveni kip Cromwella, koji je napravio Sir William Hamo Thorneycroft, pokazatelj je mišljenja iz 19. stoljeća i dio historiografije lika kojeg mnogi još uvijek vjeruju da treba slaviti.

column3: Mr Goldsmith told The Sunday Telegraph: "Cromwell is regarded by many, perhaps more in the late 19th century than today, as a defender of parliament against external pressure, in his case of course the monarchy.
column4: Goldmsith je rekao za The Sunday Telegraph: “Mnogi - možda više u kasnom 19. stoljeću nego danas - smatraju Cromwella čovjekom koji je obranio parlament od vanjskih pritisaka, u njegovom slučaju od monarhije, naravno.

column3: Whether that is a wholly accurate representation is the subject of continuing historical debate.
column4: Povjesničari i dalje raspravljaju je li to točan opis Cromwella.

column3: What is certain is that the conflict of the mid 17th century has shaped the subsequent development of our nation, and Cromwell is an individual recognisable figure who represents one side of that divide.
column4: Ono što je sigurno jest da je sukob sredinom 17. stoljeća oblikovao daljnji razvoj naše države, a Cromwella se može izdvojiti kao prepoznatljiva lika koji predstavlja jednu stranu te podjele.

column3: His achievements as Lord Protector are also worth celebrating and commemorating."
column4: Njegova postignuća kao lord zaštitnik zaslužuju veličanje i odavanje počasti.”

column3: How the US-China trade war may be good for Beijing
column4: Kako bi trgovinski rat između SAD-a i Kine mogao biti dobar za Peking

column3: The opening salvos of the trade war between the US and China were deafening, and while the battle is far from over, a rift between the countries may be beneficial to Beijing in the long term, experts say.
column4: Početna paljba u trgovinskom ratu između SAD-a i Kine bila je gromoglasna, ali iako bitka nije ni blizu gotova, razdor između zemalja mogao bi dugoročno biti koristan za Peking, kažu stručnjaci.

column3: Donald Trump, the US President, fired the first warning earlier this year by taxing key Chinese exports including solar panels, steel and aluminium.
column4: Donald Trump, američki predsjednik, ispalio je prvi pucanj upozorenja ranije ove godine kada je udario porez na ključne proizvode koji se uvoze iz Kine uključujući solarne panele, čelik i aluminij.

column3: The most significant escalation rolled in this week with new tariffs affecting $200 billion (£150 billion) worth of items, effectively taxing half of all goods coming into the US from China.
column4: Najznačajnija eskalacija dogodila se ovaj tjedan kada je carinjenje utjecalo na proizvode u vrijednosti 200 milijardi dolara (150 milijuna funti), pritom učinkovito oporezujući polovicu sve robe koja iz Kine dolazi u SAD.

column3: Beijing has retaliated each time in kind, most recently slapping tariffs of five to ten per cent on $60 billion of American goods.
column4: Peking je svaki put uzvratio istom mjerom, od kojih je zadnja udaranje poreza od 5% do 10% na američku robu u vrijednosti 60 milijardi dolara.

column3: China has pledged to match the US shot-for-shot, and the world's second largest economy is unlikely to blink anytime soon.
column4: Kina je obećala da će držati korak s SAD-om, a čini se da se drugo najveće gospodarstvo u svijetu ne planira spotaknuti.

column3: Getting Washington to back down means caving into demands, but publicly bowing to the US would be far too embarrassing for Xi Jinping, China's president.
column4: Natjerati Washington na povlačenje značilo bi podleći pritisku, a javno popustiti SAD-u bilo bi previše sramotno za Xi Jinpinga, kineskog predjednika.

column3: Still, experts say if Beijing can play its cards right, US trade war pressures could positively support China over the long term by lowering the inter-dependence of the two economies.
column4: Međutim, stručnjaci kažu da ako Peking povuče prave poteze, pritisak trgovinskog rata s SAD-om mogao bi dugoročno pozitivno utjecati na Kinu tako što će doći do smanjenja međusobne ovisnosti dvaju gospodarstva.

column3: The fact that a quick political decision in either Washington or Beijing could create the conditions that start an economic tailspin in either country is actually a lot more dangerous than onlookers have acknowledged before, said Abigail Grace, a research associate who focuses on Asia at the Center for New American Security, a think tank.
column4: Činjenica da bi brza politička odluka u Washingtonu ili Pekingu mogla stvoriti uvjete koji će pokrenuti ekonomski kaos u jednoj od zemalja zapravo je mnogo opasnija nego što se mislilo, rekla je Abigail Grace, docentica koja se bavi Azijom pri Centru za novu američku sigurnost, trustu mozgova.

column3: Brett Kavanaugh's future hangs in the balance as FBI begins investigation
column4: Budućnost Bretta Kavanaugha visi o tankoj niti dok FBI započinje s istragom

column3: I thought, if we could actually get something like what he was asking for - an investigation limited in time, limited in scope - we could maybe bring a little unity, said Mr Flake on Saturday, adding that he feared the committee was "falling apart" amid entrenched partisan gridlock.
column4: Mislio sam ako bismo zaista mogli dobiti nešto poput onoga što je on tražio- istragu ograničenu vremenom i opsegom-možda bismo mogli ostvariti jedinstvo, izjavio je g. Flake u subotu, dodavši kako je strahovao da će se povjerenstvo "raspasti" pored tog utvrđenog stranačkog kolapsa.

column3: Why didn't Mr Kavanaugh and his Republican supporters want the FBI to investigate?
column4: Zašto g. Kavanaugh i njegovi republikanski pristaše nisu htjeli da FBI istražuje?

column3: Their reluctance is all due to timing.
column4: Njihova nevoljkost proizlazi iz tempiranja.

column3: The midterm elections are only five weeks away, on November 6 - if, as expected, the Republicans do badly, then they will be severely weakened in their attempts to get the man they want elected to the highest court in the land.
column4: Izbori su za samo pet tjedana, 6. studenog, te ukoliko Republikanci loše prođu, kao što se i očekuje, onda će biti ozbiljno oslabljeni u nastojanjima da čovjek kojeg oni žele bude odabran za najviši sud u zemlji.

column3: George W. Bush has been picking up the phone to call Senators, lobbying them to support Mr Kavanaugh, who worked in the White House for Mr Bush and through him met his wife Ashley, who was Mr Bush's personal secretary.
column4: George W. Bush nazivao je senatore, zagovarajući da podrže g. Kavanaugha, koji je radio u Bijeloj kući za g. Busha i preko njega upoznao svoju suprugu Ashley, koja je bila osobna tajnica g. Busha.

column3: What happens after the FBI produces its report?
column4: Što će se dogoditi nakon što FBI izradi izvješće?

column3: There will be a vote in the Senate, where 51 Republicans and 49 Democrats currently sit.
column4: U Senatu će doći do glasovanja, gdje se trenutno nalazi 51 republikanac i 49 demokrata.

column3: It's still not clear whether Mr Kavanaugh can get to at least 50 votes on the Senate floor, which would allow Mike Pence, the vice president, to break a tie and confirm him to the Supreme Court.
column4: Još uvijek nije jasno može li g. Kavanaugh dobiti najmanje 50 glasova u Senatu, što bi neriješenim rezultatom omogućilo Mikeu Penceu, potpredsjedniku, da ga potvrdi za Vrhovni sud.

column3: Desperate rescue efforts in Palu as death toll doubles in race to find survivors
column4: Očajnički pokušaji spašavanja i utrka s vremenom za preživjele u Paluu dok se broj preminulih udvostručuje

column3: For survivors, the situation was increasingly dire.
column4: Situacija je za preživjele sve gora.

column3: It feels very tense, said 35-year-old mother Risa Kusuma, comforting her feverish baby boy at an evacuation centre in the gutted city of Palu.
column4: „Svi smo jako nervozni i napeti", rekla je tridesetpetogodišnja majka Risa Kusuma dok je tješila svoju bebu u groznici u evakuacijskom centru razorenog Palua.

column3:
Every minute an ambulance brings in bodies.	„Kola hitne pomoći svake minute donose tijela.
telegraph.405422	st06	Clean water is scarce.
column4: Jako je malo čiste vode."

column3: Residents were seen returning to their destroyed homes, picking through waterlogged belongings, trying to salvage anything they could find.
column4: Stanovnici su viđeni kako se vraćaju svojim razorenim domovima i rukama premeću po natopljenim stvarima dok pokušavaju spasiti štogod mogu.

column3: Hundreds of people were injured and hospitals, damaged by the magnitude 7.5 quake, were overwhelmed.
column4: Stotine su ozljeđene, a bolnice, oštećene nakon potresa magnitude 7.5, bile su pretrpane.

column3: Some of the injured, including Dwi Haris, who suffered a broken back and shoulder, rested outside Palu's Army Hospital, where patients were being treated outdoors due to continuing strong aftershocks.
column4: Neki od ozljeđenih, uključujući Dwi Haris, koji pati od slomljene kralježnice i ramena, ležali su izvan Vojne bolnice u Paluu, gdje su se pacijenti liječili vani zbog straha od naknadnog potresa.

column3: Tears filled his eyes as he recounted feeling the violent earthquake shake the fifth-floor hotel room he shared with his wife and daughter.
column4: Suze su mu caklile oči dok se prisjećao nasilnog potresa koji je zatresao hotelsku sobu na petom katu koju je dijelio sa svojom ženom i kćeri.

column3:
There was no time to save ourselves.	„Nije bilo vremena da se spasimo.
telegraph.405422	st06	I was squeezed into the ruins of the wall, I think, Haris told Associated Press, adding that his family was in town for a wedding.
column4: Mislim da sam bio priklješten među ruševinama zida", rekao je Haris Asociated Pressu te dodao da je s obitelji bio u gradu zbog vjenčanja.

column3:
I heard my wife cry for help, but then silence.	„Čuo sam kako moja žena zove upomoć i nakon toga samo tišinu.
telegraph.405422	st06	I don't know what happened to her and my child.	Ne znam što se dogodilo njoj i mom djetetu.
telegraph.405422	st06	I hope they are safe.
column4: Nadam se da su na sigurnom.“

column3: Paddington publishers feared readers wouldn't relate to a talking bear, new letter reveals
column4: Novo pismo otkriva da su izdavači Paddingtona u strahu da čitatelji neće moći suosjećati s medvjedom koji govori

column3: Bond's daughter Karen Jankel, who was born shortly after the book was accepted, said of the letter: "It's hard to put oneself in the shoes of somebody reading it for the first time before it was published.
column4: Bondova kćer Karen Jankel koja se rodila kratko nakon što je knjiga prihvaćena rekla je o pismu: "Teško je staviti se u cipele nekoga tko to čita prvi put prije objave.

column3: It's very amusing knowing now what we know about Paddington's huge success."
column4: Vrlo je zabavno sada znati ono što znamo o Paddingtonovom velikom uspjehu."

column3: Saying her father, who had worked as a BBC cameraman before being inspired to write the children's book by a small toy bear, would have been sanguine about his work being rejected, she added the 60th anniversary of the books publication was "bittersweet" after his death last year.
column4: Rekla je da bi njezin otac, koji je radio kao snimatelj za BBC prije nego je dobio inspiraciju za pisanje dječje knjige o plišanom medvjediću, bio uvjeren da će njegovo djelo biti odbijeno i dodala je da je šezdeseta godišnjica objave knjige bila "gorko-slatka" nakon njegove smrti prošle godine.

column3: Of Paddington, whom she describes as a "very important member of our family," she added her father was quietly proud of his eventual success.
column4: Za Paddingtona, kojeg je opisala kao "važnog člana naše obitelji", dodala je da je njezin otac bio potajno ponosan na njegov eventualni uspjeh.

column3: He was quite a quiet man, and he wasn't a boastful person, she said.
column4: Bio je prilično tih čovjek i nije bio hvalisava osoba, rekla je.

column3: But because Paddington was so real to him, it was almost like if you have a child who achieves something: you're proud of them even though it's not your doing really.	Ali zato što mu je Paddington bio toliko stvaran, bilo je skoro kao da imate dijete koje je nešto postiglo: ponosni ste na njega iako zapravo nije vaša zasluga.
I think he viewed Paddington's success sort of in that way.
column4: Mislim da je Paddingtonov uspjeh gledao na taj način.

column3: Although it was his creation and his imagination, he always used to give the credit to Paddington himself."
column4: Iako je to bila njegova kreacija i mašta, uvijek je zasluge davao samom Paddingtonu."

column3: Shark injures 13-year-old on lobster dive in California
column4: ﻿Morski pas ozlijedio je 13-godišnjaka u lovu na jastoge u Kaliforniji

column3: A shark attacked and injured a 13-year-old boy Saturday while he was diving for lobster in California on the opening day of lobster season, officials said.
column4: Morski pas napao je i ozlijedio 13-godišnjaka u subotu dok je ronio i lovio jastoge u Kaliforniji na dan otvaranja sezone jastoga, rekli su dužnosnici.

column3: The attack occurred just before 7 a.m. near Beacon's Beach in Encinitas.
column4: Napad se dogodio nešto prije 7 sati u blizini državne plaže Leucadie u Encinitasu.

column3: Chad Hammel told KSWB-TV in San Diego he had been diving with friends for about half an hour Saturday morning when he heard the boy screaming for help and then paddled over with a group to help pull him out of the water.
column4: Chad Hammel rekao je za KSWB-TV da je u San Diegu ronio s prijateljima oko pola sata u subotu ujutro kada je čuo dječaka kako vrišti u pomoć, a zatim je s grupom odveslao do njega kako bi ga izvukli iz vode.

column3: Hammel said at first he thought it was just excitement of catching a lobster, but then he "realized that he was yelling, 'I got bit!
column4: Hammel je rekao da je u početku mislio da je dječak samo uzbuđen zbog ulova jastoga, ali onda je shvatio da je vikao: „Ugrizao me!

column3: I got bit!'
column4: Ugrizao me!“.

column3: His whole clavicle was ripped open," Hammel said he noticed once he got to the boy.
column4: „Cijela ključna kost mu je bila rasparana“, primijetio je Hammel kad je došao do dječaka.

column3: I yelled at everyone to get out of the water: 'There's a shark in the water!' Hammel added.
column4: „Vikao sam na sve da izađu iz vode: 'U vodi je morski pas!'“, dodao je Hammel.

column3: The boy was airlifted to Rady Children's Hospital in San Diego where he is listed in critical condition.
column4: Dječak je zrakoplovom prebačen u dječju bolnicu Rady u San Diegu, gdje je navedeno da je u kritičnom stanju.

column3: The species of shark responsible for the attack was unknown.
column4: Vrsta morskog psa odgovornog za napad bila je nepoznata.

column3: Lifeguard Capt. Larry Giles said at a media briefing that a shark had been spotted in the area a few weeks earlier, but it was determined not to be a dangerous species of shark.
column4: Kapetan spasioca Larry Giles rekao je na brifingu za medije da je nekoliko tjedana ranije na tom području primijećen morski pas, ali utvrđeno je da nije opasna vrsta.

column3: Giles added the victim sustained traumatic injuries to his upper torso area.
column4: Giles je dodao da je žrtva zadobila traumatične ozljede na području gornjeg dijela trupa.

column3: Officials shut down beach access from Ponto Beach in Casablad to Swami's in Ecinitas for 48 hours for investigation and safety purposes.
column4: Dužnosnici su zabranili pristup plaži od plaže Ponto u Casabladu do  Swami u Encinitasu na 48 sati zbog istrage i sigurnosti.

column3: Giles noted that there are more than 135 shark species in the area, but most are not considered dangerous.
column4: Giles je primijetio da na tom području postoji više od 135 vrsta morskih pasa, ali većina se ne smatra opasnim.

column3: 18 states, D.C. support challenge to new asylum policy
column4: 18 saveznih država i D.C. podržat će osporavanje nove politike azila

column3: Eighteen states and the District of Columbia are supporting a legal challenge to a new U.S. policy that denies asylum to victims fleeing gang or domestic violence.
column4: Osamnaest saveznih država i District of Columbia poduprijet će pravno osporavanje nove politike SAD-a prema kojoj se žrtvama koje bježe od nasilja u obitelji ili od nasilja kriminalnih bandi ne priznaje pravo na azil.

column3: Representatives from the 18 states and the district filed a friend-of-the-court brief Friday in Washington to support an asylum-seeker challenging the policy, NBC News reported.
column4: Kako prenosi televizijska kuća NBC News, zastupnici 18 saveznih država i D.C.-ja podnijeli su izvještaj amicus curiae u petak u Washingtonu kako bi podržali tražiteljicu zahtjeva za azil koja pokušava osporiti politiku.

column3: The full name of the plaintiff in the Grace v. Sessions suit that the American Civil Liberties Union filed in August against the federal policy has not been revealed.
column4: Puno ime tužiteljice u parnici Grace protiv Sessionsa, koju je protiv savezne politike pokrenula nevladina organizacija American Civil Liberties Union, još nije objavljeno javnosti.

column3: She said her partner "and his violent gang member sons," abused her but U.S. officials denied her request for asylum July 20.
column4: Tužiteljica je rekla kako su je njezin partner i „njegovi nasilni sinovi koji su članovi banda" zlostavljali, međutim dužnosnici SAD-a nisu odobrili njezin zahtjev za azil 20. srpnja.

column3: She was detained in Texas.
column4: Zadržana je u pritvoru u Texasu.

column3: The states' attorneys supporting Grace described El Salvador, Honduras and Guatemala, which produce a large number of applicants for U.S. asylum, as nations facing pervasive problems with gangs and domestic violence.
column4: Državni odvjetnici koji brane Grace opisali su Salvador, Honduras i Gvatemalu (iz kojih potječe najveći broj tražitelja azila u SAD-u) kao zemlje koje su suočene sa sveprisutnim problemima kriminalnih banda i obiteljskog nasilja.

column3: The new U.S. asylum policy reversed a 2014 decision by the Board of Immigrant Appeals that allowed undocumented immigrants fleeing domestic violence to apply for asylum.
column4: Ova nova politika poništila je odluku iz 2014. najvišeg administrativnog tijela koje se bavi imigracijskim zakonima, Board of Immigration Appealsa, kojom je dozvoljeno da se imigranti koji nemaju odgovarajuće osobne isprave, a koji bježe od obiteljskog nasilja prijave za azil.

column3: District of Columbia Attorney General Karl Racine said in a statement Friday that the new policy "ignores decades of state, federal, and international law."
column4: Državni tužitelj Washington D.C.-ja Karl Racine rekao je u izjavi u petak da nova politika „ignorira desetljeća državnog, saveznog i međunarodnog prava".

column3: Federal law requires that all asylum claims be adjudicated on the particular facts and circumstances of the claim, and such a bar violates that principle, the friend-of-the court brief said.
column4: „Savezni zakon nalaže da se odluke o svim zahtjevima za azil moraju donositi na temelju činjenica i okolnosti pojedinog zahtjeva, a ovakva politika krši taj princip", stoji u izvještaju amicus curiae.

column3: Attorneys further argued in the brief that the policy denying immigrants entry hurts the U.S. economy, saying they are more likely to become entrepreneurs and "supply necessary labor."
column4: Odvjetnici nadalje u izvještaju tvrde kako politika koja imigrantima brani ulazak državu šteti gospodarstvu SAD-a zato što je vjerojatnije da će imigranti postati poduzetnici i „opskrbljivati gospodarstvo potrebnom radnom snagom".

column3: Attorney General Jeff Sessions ordered immigration judges to no longer grant asylum to victims fleeing domestic abuse and gang violence in June.
column4: Državni je tužitelj Jeff Sessions u lipnju naredio sudcima za imigraciju da više ne odobravaju azil žrtvama koje bježe od nasilja u obitelji ili od nasilja kriminalnih bandi.

column3: Asylum is available for those who leave their home country because of persecution or fear on account of race, religion, nationality, or membership in a particular social group or political opinion, Sessions said in his June 11 announcement of the policy.
column4: „Azil je dostupan onima koji napuste svoju matičnu zemlju zbog progona ili straha temeljenog na rasi, religiji, nacionalnosti ili pripadnosti određenoj društvenoj skupini ili određenom političkom stajalištu", izjavio je Sessions u najavi politike 11. lipnja.

column3: Asylum was never meant to alleviate all problems -- even all serious problems -- that people face every day all over the world.
column4: Nikada se nije smatralo da će azil umanjiti sve probleme -- čak ne i sve ozbiljne probleme -- s kojima su ljudi diljem svijeta suočeni svakoga dana.
